Enemies.name: Frowning Gaper
Enemies.description:
Walks towards Isaac, dealing contact damage. They start out with their
        eyes closed, but when they gain line of sight with Isaac, their eyes
        open and they permanently move faster. Usually turns into aPaceror with a small chance aGusherupon death.

Enemies.name: Gaper
Enemies.description: Walks towards Isaac, dealing contact damage. Usually turns into aPaceror aGusherupon death.

Enemies.name: Flaming Gaper
Enemies.description: Walks towards Isaac, dealing contact damage. Usually turns into aPacerorGusherupon death.

Enemies.name: Rotten Gaper
Enemies.description:
Walks toward Isaac, dealing contact damage. Its behavior varies slightly
        depending on its facial expression.

Enemies.name: Gurgle
Enemies.description:
Walks towards Isaac, dealing contact damage and periodically firingIpecacshots at him; they are immune to this explosion, but other enemies are
        not. Can turn into aSplasherupon death.

Enemies.name: Crackle
Enemies.description:
Walks toward Isaac, dealing contact damage and spitting fireballs that
        create lines of fire in the cardinal directions on impact.

Enemies.name: Nulls
Enemies.description:
Walks towards Isaac, dealing contact damage. Upon getting near Isaac, it
        will open its eyes, though its speed doesn't change. Fades into and out
        of visibility.

Enemies.name: Cyclopia
Enemies.description:
Walks towards Isaac, dealing contact damage and leaving behind a
        short-lasting trail of damagingRed Creep. Occasionally shoots a blood shot towards Isaac.

Enemies.name: Blue Gaper
Enemies.description: Walks towards Isaac, dealing contact damage.

Enemies.name: Greed Gaper
Enemies.description: Walks towards Isaac, dealing contact damage.

Enemies.name: Wraith
Enemies.description:
Walks toward Isaac, dealing contact damage. They are invisible and can
        only be seen through the reflection they cast in the water, or the
        ripples they make as they walk.

Enemies.name: Deep Gaper
Enemies.description:
Emerges from the floor once all previous enemies have been killed, then
        proceeds to chase Isaac. Deals contact damage.

Enemies.name: Blurb
Enemies.description:
Walks slowly towards Isaac, dealing contact damage. After taking some
        damage or getting close to Isaac, it fires a chaotic burst of tears at
        him and chases him more quickly. Can turn into aPacerorGusherupon death.

Enemies.name: Level 2 Gaper
Enemies.description:
Walks towards Isaac, dealing a full Heart of contact damage. Splits into
        aLevel 2 HorfandLevel 2 Gusherupon death.

Enemies.name: Level 2 Horf
Enemies.description:
Slowly floats toward Isaac, spittingSmall Maggotsat
        him.

Enemies.name: Level 2 Gusher
Enemies.description: Runs aimlessly around the room, spitting upSmall Maggots.

Enemies.name: Twitchy
Enemies.description:
Alternates between walking towards and rapidly leaping at Isaac, dealing
        contact damage. Can leap to Isaac's current position, or where Isaac is
        heading, and can also leap away to dodge incoming fire.

Enemies.name: Dead Isaac
Enemies.description:
Summoned byMotherat the bottom of the
        arena, they walk upward (ignoring Isaac completely), and deal contact
        damage. Releases a burst of blood shots upon being killed by Mother,
        while she launches their corpses towards Isaac.

Enemies.name: Faceless
Enemies.description:
Wanders around the room, rarely firing a radial burst of six shots.
        Chases Isaac and fires shots more frequently after taking damage.

Enemies.name: Tainted Faceless
Enemies.description:
Wanders around the room, rarely firing a radial burst of six shots.
        Chases Isaac and fires shots very frequently after taking damage.

Enemies.name: Exorcist
Enemies.description:
SummonsThe Hereticbefore
        transforming intoFanatics.

Enemies.name: Fanatic
Enemies.description:
Transformed into fromExorcists. Chases Isaac
        and occasionally fires two purple, rotating shots.

Enemies.name: Candler
Enemies.description: Flies around the room and propels itself by spawning flames.

Enemies.name: Dump
Enemies.description:
Slides toward Isaac, leaving a trail of slipperybrown creep. After
        taking enough damage, its head slides off and quickly bounces around the
        room and its body spews out brown shots until it empties.

Enemies.name: Dump Head
Enemies.description:
Quickly slides toward Isaac, leaving a trail of slipperybrown creep. Can
        spawn on its own or be created by a Dump after it takes enough damage.

Enemies.name: Gusher
Enemies.description:
Walks aimlessly around the room, occasionally firing a short-ranged
        blood shot.

Enemies.name: Pacer
Enemies.description: Walks aimlessly around the room.

Enemies.name: Splasher
Enemies.description:
Walks aimlessly around the room, firing Ipecac shots in random
        directions.

Enemies.name: Black Globin's Body
Enemies.description: Walks aimlessly around the room, occasionally spawning spiders.

Enemies.name: Horf
Enemies.description:
Stationary enemy that fires a medium-ranged blood shot at Isaac when he
        gets in range of them.

Enemies.name: Psychic Horf
Enemies.description:
Stationary enemy that fires a homing shot at Isaac when he gets in range
        of them.

Enemies.name: Sub Horf
Enemies.description:
Stationary enemy that spins and fires shots while being moved around or
        knocked back.

Enemies.name: Tainted Sub Horf
Enemies.description:
Will only shoot when hit. Takes heavy knockback and rotates when hit.
        Shoots a lot faster and has bigger projectiles than its normal variant.

Enemies.name: Necro
Enemies.description: Stationary enemy that summons unlimited-ranged bones to attack Isaac.

Enemies.name: Fly
Enemies.description:
Hovers in place. Does not deal contact damage and is harmless, but can
        turn intoPootersif they stay aroundPoop.

Enemies.name: Attack Fly
Enemies.description: Red fly that follows Isaac and deals contact damage.

Enemies.name: Moter
Enemies.description:
Follows Isaac, similar toAttack Flies. Deals
        contact damage. Splits into 2 Attack Flies upon death.

Enemies.name: Eternal Fly
Enemies.description:
Invulnerable fly that circlesCorny Poopand
        various monsters. Deals contact damage. Turns into a vulnerableAttack Flyafter the
        object or monster it circles is destroyed.

Enemies.name: Ring Fly
Enemies.description:
Gathers with any other Ring Flies in the room. These flies orbit around
        themselves while following Isaac. Deals contact damage.

Enemies.name: Dart Fly
Enemies.description:
Flies towards Isaac and attempts to predict his movements. Deals contact
        damage.

Enemies.name: Swarm
Enemies.description:
Follows Isaac in large, tightly-clustered groups and deals contact
        damage.

Enemies.name: Hush Fly
Enemies.description:
Gathers with other Hush Flies to form certain patterns. If spawned byHush, can chase Isaac or orbit
        Hush. Deals contact damage.

Enemies.name: Willo
Enemies.description:
Flies in a circle around Isaac (in formation with other Willos if
        available), keeping an exact distance away from him. One Willo at a time
        will occasionally light up and fire a shot at Isaac.

Enemies.name: Army Fly
Enemies.description:
Chases Isaac, moving along the cardinal directions. Forms a line with
        other Army Flies in the room. Deals contact damage.

Enemies.name: Ultra Famine Fly
Enemies.description: Charges at Isaac at a delay. Deals contact damage. Spawned byUltra Famine.

Enemies.name: Ultra Pestilence Fly
Enemies.description: Flies in swarms aroundUltra Pestilence, blocking shots and dealing contact damage.

Enemies.name: Fly Bomb
Enemies.description: Flies toward Isaac, circling around him as it does. Turn into a tinyBombupon death.

Enemies.name: Eternal Fly Bomb
Enemies.description: OrbitsBoom Fliesspawned byThe Horny Boys. Once its Boom Fly has been killed, turns into a tinyBomb.

Enemies.name: Sucker
Enemies.description:
Flies slowly towards Isaac, exploding into 4 shots in the cardinal
        directions upon death.

Enemies.name: Spit
Enemies.description: Flies slowly towards Isaac, firing anIpecacshot towards Isaac upon death.

Enemies.name: Ink
Enemies.description:
Flies slowly towards Isaac. Fires four shots in the ordinal directions
        and leaves a puddle of slowingBlack Creepupon death.

Enemies.name: Soul Sucker
Enemies.description: Flies slowly towards Isaac. Spawns a vortex that fires fourBrimstonebeams in the cardinal directions upon death.

Enemies.name: Mama Fly
Enemies.description:
Flies more-or-less away from Isaac, occasionally plopping on the ground
        to plant aPustule. Upon death, they
        spawn a group ofSmall Maggots.

Enemies.name: Bulb
Enemies.description:
Flies in erratic, angled movements toward Isaac if hisactive itemhas charges; on
        contact, they drain up to 2 charges, but never deal contact damage. If
        he has no active item, or no charges, they wander around the room
        aimlessly.

Enemies.name: Bloodfly
Enemies.description:
Spawned only after aPustulebursts. Flies in
        erratic, angled movements toward Isaac. Fires four blood shots in the
        cardinal directions upon death.

Enemies.name: Tainted Sucker
Enemies.description:
Flies slowly towards Isaac. Upon death, fires a radial burst of six
        blood shots that each also fires a radial burst of six blood shots.

Enemies.name: Pooter
Enemies.description:
Slowly drifts toward Isaac, occasionally firing a single blood shot at
        him. Does not deal contact damage.

Enemies.name: Super Pooter
Enemies.description:
Slowly drifts toward Isaac, occasionally firing two blood shots in a
        V-formation at him. Does not deal contact damage.

Enemies.name: Tainted Pooter
Enemies.description:
Slowly drifts toward Isaac, occasionally firing four blood shots at him
        that split into two smaller ones when they hit a wall or obstacle.

Enemies.name: Clotty
Enemies.description:
Randomly wanders around the room, firing 4 blood shots in the cardinal
        directions.

Enemies.name: Clot
Enemies.description:
Randomly wanders around the room, firing 4 tar shots in the ordinal
        directions.

Enemies.name: I.Blob
Enemies.description: Randomly wanders around the room, firing 8 shots in all directions.

Enemies.name: Grilled Clotty
Enemies.description:
Quickly and randomly wanders around the room, firing four flame shots in
        the cardinal directions at a slight angle.

Enemies.name: Cloggy
Enemies.description:
Randomly wanders around the room, firing four curved brown shots in the
        cardinal directions. These shots alternate between rotating clockwise
        and counterclockwise with each shot.

Enemies.name: Mulligan
Enemies.description:
Walks around the room, avoiding Isaac. Upon death, spawns several flies,
        which can beFlies,Attack Flies, and/orPooters. Can self-detonate
        and launch four projectiles in the cardinal directions while still
        releasing flies.

Enemies.name: Mulligoon
Enemies.description:
Walks around the room, avoiding Isaac. Upon death, spawns aTroll Bomband fires
        four shots in the ordinal directions. Can self-detonate, spawn a Troll
        bomb, and launch eight projectiles in all directions.

Enemies.name: Mulliboom
Enemies.description:
Chases Isaac and explodes upon death or upon touching Isaac. The
        explosion deals a half-heart of damage instead of the regular full
        heart.

Enemies.name: Hive
Enemies.description:
Wanders around the room, avoiding Isaac and spawningAttack Fliesif he gets
        close. Spawns a large number of flies on death, which can beFlies,Attack Flies, and/orPooters.

Enemies.name: Drowned Hive
Enemies.description: Wanders around the room, avoiding Isaac and spawningDrowned Chargersif he gets close. Spawns 0-2 Drowned Chargers upon death.

Enemies.name: Holy Mulligan
Enemies.description: Wanders around the room, avoiding Isaac and spawningAngelic Baby (small)if he gets close. Spawns 1-2Embryosupon death.

Enemies.name: Tainted Mulligan
Enemies.description:
Wanders around the room, avoiding Isaac and spawning 6Ring Fliesif he gets
        close. Spawns a plethora of fly enemies upon death.

Enemies.name: Nest
Enemies.description:
Wanders around the room, avoiding Isaac and spawningSpidersif he gets close.
        Spawns aBig SpiderorTriteupon death.

Enemies.name: Leper
Enemies.description:
Alternating between walking towards and running away from Isaac.
        Releases a Leper Flesh each time it takes enough damage. At low health,
        constantly chases Isaac and leaves behind damagingred creep. Spawns a
        Leper Flesh andGusherupon death.

Enemies.name: Leper Flesh
Enemies.description:
Floats slowly toward Isaac and fires a predictive projectile at him upon
        death.

Enemies.name: Prey
Enemies.description: Wanders around the room, avoiding Isaac and spawningSmall Leechesif he gets close. Spawns 3 Small Leeches upon death.

Enemies.name: Mullighoul
Enemies.description:
Wanders around the room, avoiding Isaac and spawningWillosif he gets close.
        Spawns 1-2 Willos upon death.

Enemies.name: Bouncer
Enemies.description:
Wanders around the room, avoiding Isaac. If Isaac stays close to one for
        long enough, it inflates and starts chasing him, gaining a chance to
        deflect shots and causing it to explode into lingering blood shots on
        death.

Enemies.name: Gas Dwarf
Enemies.description:
Chases Isaac, periodically coughing up gas clouds. On death, fires an
        explosive shot that can detonate gas clouds it hits.

Enemies.name: Danny
Enemies.description:
Walks toward Isaac and spits chaotic bursts of rocks at him, some of
        which may beRock Spiders.

Enemies.name: Coal Boy
Enemies.description: Walks toward Isaac and spits hot coals at him, some of which may beCoal Spiders.

Enemies.name: Blaster
Enemies.description: Slowly wanders around and occasionally shootsFly Bombsat Isaac.

Enemies.name: Maggot
Enemies.description: Aimlessly moves around the room, dealing contact damage.

Enemies.name: Charger
Enemies.description:
Slowly moves around the room, charging at Isaac when he gets in its line
        of sight.

Enemies.name: My Shadow
Enemies.description:
Charges at enemies when in its line of sight, dealing contact damage.
        Will always spawn friendly viaMy Shadow.

Enemies.name: Drowned Charger
Enemies.description:
Slowly moves around the room, charging at Isaac when he gets in its line
        of sight. Explodes into four blood shots in the ordinal directions upon
        death.

Enemies.name: Dank Charger
Enemies.description:
Slowly moves around the room, launching itself at Isaac if he gets in
        its line of sight. Bounces off of walls and leaves a trail of slowingBlack Creepwhile
        charging.

Enemies.name: Carrion Princess
Enemies.description:
Slowly moves around the room, charging at Isaac when he lines up
        diagonally with it. Can only be damaged by hitting its tail.

Enemies.name: Small Leech
Enemies.description:
Chases Isaac continuously, not stopping at walls. Able to swim over
        gaps.

Enemies.name: Small Maggot
Enemies.description: Slowly crawls toward Isaac, dealing contact damage.

Enemies.name: Level 2 Charger
Enemies.description:
Slowly moves around the room, charging at Isaac when he gets in its line
        of sight. Can slowly change its trajectory while charging.

Enemies.name: Elleech
Enemies.description:
Slowly moves around the room. After Isaac gets in its line of sight,
        continuously charges at him in the closest cardinal direction.

Enemies.name: Blood Puppy
Enemies.description:
Quickly moves around the room, attacking and charging at other monsters
        and Isaac when they get in its line of sight.

Enemies.name: Spitty
Enemies.description:
Slowly moves around the room, occasionally firing a single blood shot
        forward.

Enemies.name: Tainted Spitty
Enemies.description:
Slowly moves around the room, firing chaotic bursts of blood shots in
        all directions and occasionally spitting a line of blood shots in the
        direction it's facing. Fires two rotating rings of blood shots upon
        death.

Enemies.name: Conjoined Spitty
Enemies.description:
Slowly moves around the room, occasionally firing a blood shot from both
        ends of its body.

Enemies.name: Globin
Enemies.description:
Chases Isaac, dealing a full heart of contact damage. Upon taking enough
        damage, it collapses into a pile of goo, which can be killed. Will
        regenerate after a short period of time if not killed quickly.

Enemies.name: Gazing Globin
Enemies.description:
Quickly chases Isaac, dealing a full heart of contact damage. Upon
        taking enough damage, it collapses into a pile of goo, which will slide
        away from Isaac and can be killed. Will regenerate after a short period
        of time if not killed quickly.

Enemies.name: Dank Globin
Enemies.description:
Chases Isaac, dealing a full heart of contact damage. Upon taking enough
        damage, it collapses into a pile of goo, spawns aSpider, and leaves a puddle
        of slowingBlack Creep. Will
        regenerate after a short time if not killed quickly. Leaves another
        puddle of Black Creep upon death.

Enemies.name: Cursed Globin
Enemies.description:
Chases Isaac, dealing a full heart of contact damage. Upon taking enough
        damage, it collapses into 1-2 piles of goo, each of which can be killed
        and regenerate after a short period of time if not killed quickly. These
        goo piles have less health the more times the Cursed Globin splits.

Enemies.name: Black Globin
Enemies.description:
Chases Isaac, dealing a full heart of contact damage and launchingSpiderstowards Isaac
        whenever it takes damage. Spawns a Spider, aBlack Globin's Head, and aBlack Globin's Bodyupon death.

Enemies.name: Clickety Clack
Enemies.description:
Walks towards Isaac and turn into a pile of bones when killed.
        Regenerates a few seconds after killed. Will only despawn if all
        Clickety Clacks in the room are killed.

Enemies.name: Gasbag
Enemies.description:
Occasionally summonsArmy Fliesto chase Isaac.
        Is surrounded by a ring of toxic gas that hurts Isaac if he stands in it
        for too long.

Enemies.name: Cohort
Enemies.description:
Acts similarly toMonstro, hopping towards
        Isaac and can either spit a large projectile towards Isaac that bursts
        into 8 smaller projectiles or cough up a burst of arcing projectiles and
        a pile ofGlobingoo. Spawns 4 piles of
        Globin goo upon death.

Enemies.name: Boom Fly
Enemies.description:
Flies across the room in straight diagonal lines, dealing contact
        damage. Explodes upon death.

Enemies.name: Red Boom Fly
Enemies.description:
Flies across the room in straight diagonal lines, dealing contact
        damage. Creates a ring of 6 blood shots upon death.

Enemies.name: Drowned Boom Fly
Enemies.description:
Flies across the room in straight diagonal lines, dealing contact
        damage. Upon death, explodes and fires four blood shots in the cardinal
        directions. Also has a chance to spawn aDrowned Chargerupon death.

Enemies.name: Dragon Fly
Enemies.description:
Flies across the room in straight diagonal lines, dealing contact
        damage. Upon death, creates four lines of fire in the cardinal
        directions; the fire nearly spans the length of an entire normal-sized
        room.

Enemies.name: Dragon Fly X
Enemies.description:
Flies across the room in straight diagonal lines, dealing contact
        damage. Upon death, creates four lines of fire in the ordinal
        directions; the fire nearly spans the length of an entire normal-sized
        room.

Enemies.name: Bone Fly
Enemies.description:
Flies across the room in straight diagonal lines, dealing contact
        damage. Fires bones at Isaac if he lines up with it in the cardinal
        directions. Fires a radial burst of 3 bones upon death.

Enemies.name: Sick Boom Fly
Enemies.description:
Flies across the room in straight diagonal lines, dealing contact damage
        and trailing poisonous gas. Upon death, explodes into a gas cloud and
        fires a ring of 6 green shots.

Enemies.name: Tainted Boom Fly
Enemies.description:
Flies across the room in straight diagonal lines, dealing contact
        damage. Upon death, it glows brightly, warning that it is about to
        explode; this explosion sends 4 lines of further explosions in the
        cardinal directions, which span the length of the room.

Enemies.name: Maw
Enemies.description:
Slowly floats towards Isaac, firing a blood shot at him when he is in
        their range.

Enemies.name: Red Maw
Enemies.description:
Floats quickly towards Isaac and releases 4 blood shots in the cardinal
        directions upon death.

Enemies.name: Psychic Maw
Enemies.description:
Slowly floats towards Isaac, firing homing shots at him when he is in
        their range. Spawns with an Eternal Fly orbiting around it.

Enemies.name: Host
Enemies.description:
Stationary enemy that is normally invulnerable. Raises its head up when
        Isaac gets close, revealing a fleshy stem that can be damaged. Upon
        raising its head, it will fire 3 blood shots in a spread and lower its
        head again.

Enemies.name: Red Host
Enemies.description:
Stationary enemy that can be damaged even when its head is lowered. Fire
        5 spread blood shots when it raises its head.

Enemies.name: Hard Host
Enemies.description:
Stationary enemy that is normally invulnerable. Raises its head up when
        Isaac gets close, revealing a fleshy stem that can be damaged. Shortly
        after raising its head, it slams its head down and fires a rock wave
        towards Isaac.

Enemies.name: Mobile Host
Enemies.description: Acts like the Host, but follows Isaac and deals contact damage.

Enemies.name: Flesh Mobile Host
Enemies.description: Acts like the Red Host, but follows Isaac and deals contact damage.

Enemies.name: Floast
Enemies.description:
Floats diagonally around the room and is normally invulnerable. When
        Isaac gets close, reveals a fleshy stem that can be damaged and fires 3
        blood shots in an angle at him before hiding its stem again.

Enemies.name: Mushroom
Enemies.description:
Stationary enemy that occasionally pops up and fires four shots in the
        cardinal or diagonal directions. Takes less damage while its head is
        down.

Enemies.name: Hopper
Enemies.description:
Slowly hops around the room, doing contact damage. Can turn into a
        Flaming Hopper by jumping intoFire Placesor other fires.

Enemies.name: Eggy
Enemies.description:
Hops aimlessly around the room, spawning slowingwhite creepwherever
        it hops. Spawns a group ofSwarm Spidersupon death.

Enemies.name: Tainted Hopper
Enemies.description:
Jumps and twirls around the room, shooting 4 rings of projectiles that
        increase in size with each shot.

Enemies.name: Leaper
Enemies.description:
Hops around the room, doing contact damage. Occasionally jumps high into
        the air, dropping down onto Isaac's position while firing 4 blood shots
        in the cardinal directions.

Enemies.name: Sticky Leaper
Enemies.description:
Hops around the room, dealing contact damage. Occasionally jumps high
        into the air, dropping down onto Isaac's position while creating a
        chaotic burst of tar shots in all directions and a puddle of slowingblack creep.

Enemies.name: Flaming Hopper
Enemies.description:
Quickly hops around the room, doing contact damage. Covers a larger
        distance than the regular Hopper.

Enemies.name: Trite
Enemies.description: Quickly leaps towards Isaac and deals contact damage.

Enemies.name: Ragling
Enemies.description:
Quickly leaps towards Isaac and deals contact damage. Randomly shoots
        two purple shots that orbit around it.

Enemies.name: Rag Man's Ragling
Enemies.description:
Quickly leaps towards Isaac and deals contact damage. Randomly shoots
        two purple shots that orbit around it.

Enemies.name: Blister
Enemies.description: Slowly hops towards Isaac, occasionally spawning a Dark Ball. Spawns aSackupon death.

Enemies.name: Boil
Enemies.description:
Stationary enemy that decreases in size when hit, but regenerates to its
        full size until fully destroyed. Fires multiple short-ranged blood
        projectiles in random directions when fully swollen.

Enemies.name: Gut
Enemies.description:
Stationary enemy that decreases in size when hit, but regenerates to its
        full size until fully destroyed. FiresIpecacshots in random directions when fully swollen.

Enemies.name: Sack
Enemies.description:
Stationary enemy that decreases in size when hit, but regenerates to its
        full size until fully destroyed. Occasionally spawnsSpiderswhen fully swollen.

Enemies.name: Blue Boil
Enemies.description:
Stationary enemy that decreases in size when hit, but regenerates to its
        full size until fully destroyed. Fires 1-3 blood shots towards Isaac
        when fully swollen.

Enemies.name: Gush
Enemies.description: Stationary, harmless enemy that continually creates slowingblack creep.

Enemies.name: Pustule
Enemies.description:
Slowly increases in size over time, spawningSmall Maggotsand damagingred creepdepending on
        its size upon death. If it grows to full size, it transforms into aBloodfly.

Enemies.name: Walking Boil
Enemies.description:
Does not shrink or regenerate. Walks around aimlessly and fires multiple
        short-ranged blood projectiles in random directions.

Enemies.name: Walking Gut
Enemies.description: Does not shrink or regenerate. Walks around aimlessly and firesIpecacshots in random directions.

Enemies.name: Walking Sack
Enemies.description:
Does not shrink or regenerate. Walks around aimlessly and occasionally
        spawnsSpiders.

Enemies.name: Brain
Enemies.description: Slowly crawls around the room, leaving a trail ofRed Creep.

Enemies.name: Black Globin's Head
Enemies.description: Slides towards Isaac, leaving a trail of damagingRed Creep.

Enemies.name: Festering Guts
Enemies.description:
Spawned byGutted Fatties,
        Festering Guts randomly slide around the room and occasionally spawn aCharger.

Enemies.name: Poison Mind
Enemies.description: Slowlycrawls/floats around the room diagonally, leaving a trail of damaginggreen creep.Explodes upon death.

Enemies.name: Pon
Enemies.description:
Hops around the room, leaving damagingred creepwherever it
        lands. Upon death, its associatedBrainless Knightdies with it.

Enemies.name: Gyro
Enemies.description:
Rolls around like a wheel. Charges at Isaac when he is in line of sight,
        bouncing off of walls and obstacles as it does.

Enemies.name: Grilled Gyro
Enemies.description:
Rolls around like a wheel. Charges at Isaac when he is in line of sight,
        bouncing off of walls and obstacles and creating fires behind itself as
        it does.

Enemies.name: Mr. Maw
Enemies.description:
Walks towards Isaac and attacks by launching its head towards him. Turns
        into aMaworGusherupon death
        depending on the killed body segment. Occasionally separates at will.

Enemies.name: Mr. Red Maw
Enemies.description:
Walks towards Isaac and attacks by launching its head towards him. Turns
        into aRed Mawor Gusher upon
        death depending on the killed body segment. Occasionally separates at
        will.

Enemies.name: Swinger
Enemies.description:
Slowly moves towards Isaac as its head swings around its base. Upon
        death, spawns aMawor aGlobindepending on which
        part is killed.

Enemies.name: Mr. Mine
Enemies.description:
Can only appear in pits. Attempts to launch itself at Isaac if he comes
        near. Occasionally burrows and pops up in another pit, and fires six
        shots in all directions upon death.

Enemies.name: Baby
Enemies.description:
Slowly floats towards Isaac and fires a blood shot at him. Occasionally
        teleports and reappears elsewhere.

Enemies.name: Angelic Baby
Enemies.description:
Slowly floats towards Isaac and fires three spread shots. Occasionally
        teleports and reappears elsewhere.

Enemies.name: Angelic Baby (small)
Enemies.description:
Slowly floats towards Isaac and fires a blood shot at him. Occasionally
        teleports and reappears elsewhere. Can only be spawned byHoly Mulligans.

Enemies.name: Wrinkly Baby
Enemies.description:
Dashes towards Isaac at high speed and fires three blood shots in his
        direction once stopped.

Enemies.name: Imp
Enemies.description:
Slowly drifts towards Isaac, frequently firing 5 blood shots in quick
        succession towards him. Tries to avoid Isaac's shots and occasionally
        teleports and reappears elsewhere.

Enemies.name: Unborn
Enemies.description:
Floats quickly towards Isaac, and occasionally teleports to another
        position near him.

Enemies.name: Baby Begotten
Enemies.description:
Floats toward Isaac, avoiding his shots. After getting close, fires a
        shortBrimstonelaser in the closest cardinal direction and propels itself away from
        him.

Enemies.name: Vis
Enemies.description:
Randomly wanders around the room. Pauses to charge and fire a Brimstone
        laser when Isaac gets in its line of sight.

Enemies.name: Double Vis
Enemies.description:
Randomly wanders around the room. Pauses to charge and fire a Brimstone
        laser which fires from both sides when Isaac gets in its line of sight.

Enemies.name: Chubber
Enemies.description:
Randomly wanders around the room. Pauses to fire a Charger that deals
        one heart of damage when Isaac gets in its line of sight. The Charger is
        invulnerable, blocks Isaac's tears, has limited range, and flies back to
        the Chubber.

Enemies.name: Scarred Double Vis
Enemies.description:
Randomly wanders around the room. Pauses to charge and fire a Brimstone
        laser which fires from all four cardinal sides when Isaac gets in its
        line of sight.

Enemies.name: Vis Versa
Enemies.description:
Randomly wanders around the room. Pauses to charge and fire a homing
        Brimstone laser when Isaac gets in its line of sight.

Enemies.name: Evis
Enemies.description:
Randomly wanders around the room. Launches a string of guts when Isaac
        gets close to it, which it uses to pull Isaac toward itself.

Enemies.name: Guts
Enemies.description: Attaches itself to a wall or obstacle and rolls around it.

Enemies.name: Scarred Guts
Enemies.description:
Attaches itself to a wall or obstacle and rolls around it, leaving a
        trail of damaging Red Creep.

Enemies.name: Slog
Enemies.description:
Attaches itself to a wall or obstacle and rolls around it, charging at
        Isaac when he is in sight.

Enemies.name: Cyst
Enemies.description:
Attaches itself to a wall or obstacle and rolls around it, regularly
        firing blood shots at Isaac.

Enemies.name: Knight
Enemies.description:
Moves erratically around the room and charges towards Isaac when in line
        of sight. Can only be damaged from behind.

Enemies.name: Selfless Knight
Enemies.description:
Moves erratically around the room and charges towards Isaac very quickly
        when in line of sight. Can only be damaged from behind.

Enemies.name: Loose Knight
Enemies.description:
Moves erratically around the room, charges toward Isaac when in line of
        sight. When its health is depleted, it turns into a Brainless Knight and
        aPon.

Enemies.name: Brainless Knight
Enemies.description:
Alternates between running around the room along the cardinal directions
        and aimlessly walking in circles. Charges at Isaac when in line of
        sight. Dies when its correspondingPondies.

Enemies.name: Black Knight
Enemies.description:
Moves erratically around the room, charges toward Isaac when in line of
        sight. Unleashes waves of fire in all cardinal directions upon charging
        into an obstacle. Shots that hit it from the front are deflected back at
        Isaac.

Enemies.name: Floating Knight
Enemies.description: Behaves like the Knight but slower, and can fly over all obstacles.

Enemies.name: Bone Knight
Enemies.description:
Moves erratically around the room, charges toward Isaac when in line of
        sight, and leaves behind a short-lasting trail of damaging Red Creep.
        Can only be damaged from behind.

Enemies.name: Whipper
Enemies.description:
Runs around the room, sprinting at Isaac when he gets in its line of
        sight and lashing at him when it gets close.

Enemies.name: Snapper
Enemies.description:
Runs around the room, sprinting at Isaac when he gets in its line of
        sight and throwing out its whip when he gets in range.

Enemies.name: Flagellant
Enemies.description:
Runs around the room. When Isaac gets in its line of sight, continuously
        chases him and lashes its whip, occasionally deflecting Isaac’s shots.

Enemies.name: Dople
Enemies.description:
Mirrors Isaac's movements and fires blood shots at the same time as
        Isaac. Can be damaged by spikes.

Enemies.name: Evil Twin
Enemies.description:
Mirrors Isaac's movements and fires three spread blood shots at the same
        time as Isaac. Can fly over obstacles.

Enemies.name: Leech
Enemies.description: Quickly charges towards Isaac when he gets in its line of sight.

Enemies.name: Kamikaze Leech
Enemies.description:
Quickly charges towards Isaac when he gets in its line of sight.
        Explodes upon death.

Enemies.name: Holy Leech
Enemies.description:
Quickly charges towards Isaac when he gets in its line of sight.
        Explodes upon death. Spawns with anEternal Flycircling it, which instantly dies when the Holy Leech explodes.

Enemies.name: Adult Leech
Enemies.description:
Wanders around the room, quickly charging at Isaac when he lines up
        horizontally with him and releasing a ring of blood shots upon colliding
        with a wall. After taking a certain amount of damage, burrows into the
        ground and reappears by falling above Isaac, releasing another ring of
        blood shots and only performing this behavior once.

Enemies.name: Lump
Enemies.description:
Fires 3 spread blood shots at Isaac when he gets in its line of sight.
        Will burrow underground and reappear elsewhere after firing.

Enemies.name: Tar Boy
Enemies.description:
Fires a short-ranged spray of shots that leave behind slowingBlack Creep.
        Occasionally burrows underground and reappears under any pools of black
        creep in the room. If Isaac stands on the Creep, the Tar Boy canfire shots straight upwards out of the Creep underneath Isaac/send out a tentacle underneath Isaac.

Enemies.name: MemBrain
Enemies.description:
Slowly moves around the room, occasionally hopping and firing 8 large
        blood shots in all directions. Splits into 2Brainsupon death.

Enemies.name: Mama Guts
Enemies.description:
Slowly moves around the room, occasionally hopping and firing 8 large
        blood shots in all directions. Splits into 2Gutsupon death.

Enemies.name: Dead Meat
Enemies.description:
Slowly moves around the room, occasionally hopping and firing 8 large
        blood shots in all directions that bounce off the walls. Splits into 2Cystsupon death.

Enemies.name: Dinga
Enemies.description:
Slowly moves around the room, occasionally hopping to spawnDipsor fire 8 Brown shots in all
        directions. Splits 2Squirtsupon death.

Enemies.name: Mega Clotty
Enemies.description:
Slowly moves around the room, occasionally hopping and either firing 6
        blood shots in all directions, leaving a puddle of Red Creep, or
        spawning aClottyor a collapsedGlobin. Splits into twoClottiesupon death.

Enemies.name: Para-Bite
Enemies.description:
Moves towards Isaac, dealing contact damage. Can burrow underground and
        reappear elsewhere.

Enemies.name: Scarred Para-Bite
Enemies.description:
Moves towards Isaac, dealing contact damage and firing a short-range
        blood shot at him. Can burrow underground and reappear elsewhere.

Enemies.name: Fred
Enemies.description:
Hops out of the ground and burrows elsewhere, firing 4 blood shots in
        the cardinal directions. Occasionally fires red Ipecac shots at Isaac.

Enemies.name: Eye
Enemies.description:
Slowly turns towards Isaac and fires a Technology laser at Isaac if he
        stands still or is too slow.

Enemies.name: Bloodshot Eye
Enemies.description:
Slowly turns towards Isaac and fires a Brimstone beam at Isaac if he
        stands still or is too slow.

Enemies.name: Holy Eye
Enemies.description: Rapidly summons several beams of light around Isaac every few seconds.

Enemies.name: Embryo
Enemies.description: Aimlessly hops around the room, dealing contact damage.

Enemies.name: Spider
Enemies.description:
Erratically moves around the room. If Isaac gets close to it, it chases
        him, trying to deal contact damage.

Enemies.name: Big Spider
Enemies.description:
Erratically moves around the room. If Isaac gets close to it, it chases
        him, trying to deal contact damage. Spawns two Spiders upon death.

Enemies.name: Strider
Enemies.description:
Erratically swims around the room. If it sees Isaac, it chases him,
        trying to deal contact damage.

Enemies.name: Rock Spider
Enemies.description:
Slowly crawls around the room. If it sees Isaac, it crawls at him,
        trying to deal contact damage. Turns into aSpiderupon death. Turns into
        aCoal Spiderif it touches fire.

Enemies.name: Tinted Rock Spider
Enemies.description:
Quickly crawls around the room. If it sees Isaac, it crawls at him,
        trying to deal contact damage. Turns into aSoul Heartupon death. Can only spawn by breakingtinted rocksonMinesorAshpit.

Enemies.name: Coal Spider
Enemies.description:
Quickly crawls around the room. If it sees Isaac, it crawls at him,
        trying to deal contact damage. Turns into a hot coal upon death that
        blocks shots and deals contact damage, but can be destroyed.

Enemies.name: Swarm Spider
Enemies.description:
Very erratically hops toward Isaac in large groups, dealing contact
        damage.

Enemies.name: Keeper
Enemies.description:
Hops around the room, firing 2 blood shots in a V formation at Isaac.
        Upon damaging Isaac, Isaac drops 2 coins on the ground but loses 3.

Enemies.name: Buttlicker
Enemies.description:
Can start attached to other Buttlickers and erratically moves around the
        room, similar toLarry Jr..

Enemies.name: Butt Slicker
Enemies.description:
Moves erratically around the room unless attached to another Butt
        Slicker. Grouped Butt Slickers drag themselves towards Isaac, and when
        an individual is killed they leave black creep, and shoot out black
        projectiles. The amount of projectiles released and the size of the pool
        of Black Creep is determined by the amount of Butt Slickers attached.

Enemies.name: Hanger
Enemies.description:
Floats around the room, firing 3 spread blood shots at Isaac. Upon
        damaging Isaac, Isaac drops 2coinson the ground but loses 3.
        Spawns with anEternal Flycircling
        around it.

Enemies.name: Swarmer
Enemies.description:
Slowly floats around the room, spawning severalAttack Flies. SpawnsPootersupon taking damage.
        Spawns aBoom Flyupon death.

Enemies.name: Mask + Heart
Enemies.description:
The Mask is invulnerable and moves around erratically, charging at Isaac
        when he lines up with it. The Heart avoids Isaac and fires 4 blood shots
        in the cardinal directions when Isaac gets near. Killing the Heart will
        automatically kill the Mask.

Enemies.name: Mask II + 1/2 Heart
Enemies.description:
The Mask is invulnerable and moves around erratically, charging at Isaac
        when he lines up with it. The Heart avoids Isaac and fires 4 blood shots
        in the ordinal directions when Isaac gets near. Killing the Heart will
        automatically kill the Mask. If there are more than one 1/2 Heart in the
        room, they will fire blood shots between each other.

Enemies.name: Baby Long Legs
Enemies.description: Runs away from Isaac and frequently spawns Spiders.

Enemies.name: Small Baby Long Legs
Enemies.description: Runs away from Isaac and occasionally spawns Sacks.

Enemies.name: Crazy Long Legs
Enemies.description:
Chases Isaac, dealing touch damage. Occasionally stops to spit 8 blood
        shots in all directions.

Enemies.name: Small Crazy Long Legs
Enemies.description:
Chases Isaac, dealing touch damage. Occasionally stops to spit 4 blood
        shots in the diagonal directions.

Enemies.name: Fatty
Enemies.description:
Slowly walks towards Isaac. Occasionally farts, which pushes Isaac and
        adjacent enemies away.

Enemies.name: Pale Fatty
Enemies.description:
Slowly walks towards Isaac. Occasionally farts and shoots 6 blood shots
        in all directions. Has a chance to turn into a Blubber upon death.

Enemies.name: Flaming Fatty
Enemies.description:
Slowly walks towards Isaac. Occasionally farts, which pushes Isaac and
        adjacent enemies awayand spawns a damaging flame. Has a chance to leave behind a damaging
        flame upon death.

Enemies.name: Fat Sack
Enemies.description:
Slowly walks towards Isaac. Occasionally leaps off-screen and attempts
        to land on Isaac, leaving a puddle of Red Creep and shooting 6 blood
        shots in all directions where it lands. Has a chance to turn into a
        Blubber upon death.

Enemies.name: Blubber
Enemies.description:
Walks around aimlessly and randomly spews a cluster of blood shots in
        all directions. Has a chance to turn into a Half Sack when killed.

Enemies.name: Half Sack
Enemies.description: Wanders around aimlessly and leaves a trail of Red Creep.

Enemies.name: Conjoined Fatty
Enemies.description:
Slowly walks towards Isaac. Occasionally pauses to fart out a line of
        damaging Green Creep towards Isaac. Chance to turn into a regular Fatty
        upon death.

Enemies.name: Blue Conjoined Fatty
Enemies.description:
Slowly walks towards Isaac and occasionally farts out a homing Ipecac
        shot at Isaac.

Enemies.name: Stoney
Enemies.description:
Chases Isaac and blocks tears, but does not deal contact damage.
        Temporarily pauses in exhaustion after a certain amount of time.
        Invulnerable; dies when the room is cleared.

Enemies.name: Cross Stoney
Enemies.description: Chases Isaac and shoots 4 tears vertically and diagonally like aCross Stone Shooter. Dies when the room is cleared.Only appears inAprils Fool(challenge #32) as replacements to regular Stoneys.

Enemies.name: Bubbles
Enemies.description:
Slowly walks towards Isaac, firing back shots upon taking damage.
        Occasionally farts, which pushes Isaac and adjacent enemies away and
        creates a chaotic burst of shots. Creates a geyser of water shots upon
        death.

Enemies.name: Quakey
Enemies.description:
Walks slowly toward Isaac, occasionally attempting to jump on Isaac,
        shooting out 8 rock shots when it hits the ground and causing rocks to
        fall from the ceiling.

Enemies.name: Big Bony
Enemies.description:
Walks slowly toward Isaac, and will occasionally fire a bone that
        bounces around the room for a few moments. The bone can be broken if
        shot enough.

Enemies.name: Gutted Fatty
Enemies.description:
Slowly lumbers around the room, occasionally spawningFestering Guts.
        Its eyes dislocate as it takes damage, which are invincible and follow
        the Gutted Fatty but chase Isaac if he gets close to them. Creates a
        geyser of blood projectiles upon death.

Enemies.name: Gutted Fatty Eye
Enemies.description:
Invulnerable enemy spawned by Gutted Fatties. Hovers around their
        correlating Gutted Fatty unless Isaac draws near, after which it will
        chase Isaac, blocking tears and dealing contact damage.

Enemies.name: Peeping Fatty
Enemies.description:
Has two indestructible Peeping Fatty Eyes that are out of their sockets
        but attached by muscles. Wanders around the room randomly, or toward
        Isaac if its eyes see him. Occasionally farts and fires a radial burst
        of 6 blood shots.

Enemies.name: Peeping Fatty Eye
Enemies.description:
Invulnerable enemy attached to a Peeping Fatty. Follows Isaac when in
        line of sight, blocking tears and dealing contact damage.

Enemies.name: Bloaty
Enemies.description:
Lumbers around, occasionally spitting green shots and a line of damaginggreen creepin a
        random direction.

Enemies.name: Vis Fatty
Enemies.description:
Spawns with a Fetal Demon attached to it and slowly walks towards Isaac.
        Will occasionally fart, briefly pushing the demon away and spawning
        creep around itself and the demon. If the demon is killed first, the
        Fatty will shoot outBrimstonein the diagonal direction closest to Isaac. It will then fly around the
        room diagonally, bumping off of walls and tall blocks, all while
        continuously firingBrimstonebehind it.

Enemies.name: Fetal Demon
Enemies.description:
Usually encountered tethered toVis Fatties. When
        tethered it makes short lunges towards Isaac if he gets close. If the
        Vis Fatty is killed or when encountered alone, it will chase Isaac,
        similarly toGemini's Suture.

Enemies.name: Shady
Enemies.description:
Walks slowly toward Isaac, occasionally firing a shot that creates shots
        perpendicular to itself while traveling and splits into a ring of shots
        upon hitting a wall or obstacle. Also occasionally jumps, creating lines
        of explosions in the cardinal directions. One of the few enemies that
        utilizeDamage Scaling.

Enemies.name: Death's Head
Enemies.description:
Invulnerable enemy that moves diagonally around the room, dealing
        contact damage. Dies when the room is cleared.

Enemies.name: Dank Death's Head
Enemies.description:
Moves diagonally around the room, dealing contact damage. Needs to be
        killed to complete the room.

Enemies.name: Cursed Death's Head
Enemies.description:
Invulnerable enemy that moves diagonally around the room, dealing
        contact damage. If Isaac enters its purple aura, he will be inflicted
        withfearand be temporarily unable to shoot. Dies when the room is cleared.

Enemies.name: Brimstone Death's Head
Enemies.description:
Invulnerable enemy that moves diagonally around the room, pausing to
        fire aBrimstonelaser when Isaac lines up with it in the cardinal directions. Dies when
        the room is cleared.

Enemies.name: Redskull
Enemies.description:
Moves diagonally around the room, creating a ring of fire around itself
        if Isaac gets close to it. Can be killed, but also dies when the room is
        cleared.

Enemies.name: Flesh Death's Head
Enemies.description:
Moves diagonally around the room, dealing contact damage. Releases 6
        blood shots in all directions upon death. Can be killed, but also dies
        when the room is cleared.

Enemies.name: Dusty Death's Head
Enemies.description:
Invulnerable enemy that moves across the room in a waving motion in
        large quantities. Dies when the room is cleared.

Enemies.name: Ultra Death Head
Enemies.description:
Invulnerable enemy spawned byUltra Deaththat
        moves across the room in a waving motion in large quantities as a part
        of one of his attacks. Dies upon the completion of the attack.

Enemies.name: Mom's Hand
Enemies.description:
Falls from the ceiling. If it lands on Isaac, it deals damage and
        teleports him back to the spawn room of the floor. Entering a room
        containing Mom's Hand will warn Isaac with Mom's laugh.

Enemies.name: Mom's Dead Hand
Enemies.description:
Falls from the ceiling. Upon landing, it spawns several rock waves that
        travel outwards. Spawns several spiders upon death. Entering a room
        containing Mom's Dead Hand will warn Isaac with Mom's laugh.

Enemies.name: Level 2 Fly
Enemies.description: Flies toward Isaac erratically, dealing contact damage.

Enemies.name: Full Fly
Enemies.description:
Flies toward Isaac erratically, dealing contact damage. Releases 6
        bullets in all directions upon death.

Enemies.name: Level 2 Willo
Enemies.description:
Orbits enemies and shoots tears at Isaac. If the enemy it is orbiting
        dies, it will orbit another enemy. However, if all enemies are dead, it
        will chase Isaac, while still occasionally shooting at Isaac.

Enemies.name: Level 2 Spider
Enemies.description:
Crawls around the room erratically, following Isaac and dealing contact
        damage. Can jump small distances.

Enemies.name: Ticking Spider
Enemies.description:
Crawls around the room erratically, following Isaac and dealing contact
        damage. Can jump small distances. Explodes upon death.

Enemies.name: Migraine
Enemies.description:
Crawls around the room erratically, following Isaac and dealing contact
        damage. Can jump small distances. Releases multipleTroll Bombsupon
        death.

Enemies.name: Dip
Enemies.description: Slowly dashes in random directions, dealing contact damage.

Enemies.name: Corn
Enemies.description: Quickly dashes in random directions, dealing contact damage.

Enemies.name: Brownie Corn
Enemies.description: Quickly dashes in random directions, dealing contact damage.

Enemies.name: Big Corn
Enemies.description:
Quickly dashes in random directions, dealing contact damage. Shoots one
        piece of corn upon death.

Enemies.name: Drip
Enemies.description: Quickly rolls around in diagonal directions, dealing contact damage.

Enemies.name: Wizoob
Enemies.description:
Disappears, then appears near Isaac and spits a cluster of spectral
        tears at him.

Enemies.name: Red Ghost
Enemies.description: Disappears, then reappears near Isaac and fires a brimstone laser.

Enemies.name: Squirt
Enemies.description: Dashes towards Isaac and deals contact damage. Spawns 2Dipsupon death.

Enemies.name: Dank Squirt
Enemies.description:
Dashes towards Isaac and deals contact damage, creating slowingblack creep. Spawns
        2Clotsupon
        death.

Enemies.name: Hardy
Enemies.description:
Dashes toward Isaac and deals contact damage creating rock projectiles
        when it hits a wall/obstacle. It spawns more rock projectiles the more
        times it crashes into obstacles, dying after doing so a third time.

Enemies.name: Splurt
Enemies.description:
Dashes towards Isaac twice and deals contact damage. Spawns 2Dripsupon
        death.

Enemies.name: Cod Worm
Enemies.description:
Stationary enemy that hides in a shell and spews a burst of blood shots
        if shot at. Only vulnerable when it pops its head out.

Enemies.name: Oob
Enemies.description:
When Isaac lines up with it horizontally, it charges across the room
        once. When Isaac is not horizontal to it, it spawns Brains.

Enemies.name: Black Maw
Enemies.description:
When Isaac lines up with it horizontally, it charges in his direction
        and then doubles back, charging back to its original position. When
        Isaac is not horizontal to it, it spawns Leeches. Explodes when it dies.

Enemies.name: Skinny
Enemies.description:
Slowly walks towards Isaac, leaving short-lastingRed Creepbehind
        itself.

Enemies.name: Rotty
Enemies.description:
Slowly walks towards Isaac, leaving short-lastingRed Creepbehind
        itself. Spawns aBonyor twoAttack Fliesupon death.

Enemies.name: Crispy
Enemies.description:
Slowly walks towards Isaac, but increases in speed as they take damage.
        Constantly passively takes damage.

Enemies.name: Bony
Enemies.description: Wanders around the room and throws a bone at Isaac when he is in sight.

Enemies.name: Holy Bony
Enemies.description:
Wanders around the room, throwing a bone at Isaac when he is in sight.
        The thrown bone leaves behind a blue flame that deals contact damage,
        blocks Isaac’s shots, and despawns after some time.

Enemies.name: Black Bony
Enemies.description:
Wanders around the room and throws three bones in a row at Isaac when he
        is in sight. Explodes upon death.

Enemies.name: Revenant
Enemies.description:
Slowly wanders around the room, stopping to fire a large line of fire at
        the player.

Enemies.name: Quad Revenant
Enemies.description:
Wanders around the room slowly, stopping to fire lines of flames in the
        cardinal or ordinal directions, rotating in an attempt to hit Isaac.

Enemies.name: Maze Roamer
Enemies.description:
Wanders around the room and shoots an eyeball at Isaac when he is in
        sight. Has a clone of itself on the other side of the room that mimics
        its movement and shots. If one dies, the other starts actively pursuing
        Isaac.

Enemies.name: Homunculus
Enemies.description:
Starts attached to the wall or anobstacle. After a while, it detaches, shooting 6 blood shots in all
        directions, leaving a puddle of Red Creep and chasing Isaac. If it dies
        while still attached, it will still leave a puddle of Red Creep.

Enemies.name: Begotten
Enemies.description:
Starts attached to the wall or anobstacle. After a while, it detaches, firing 6 blood shots in all
        directions, turning the room dark, becoming invisible and chasing Isaac.
        Briefly becomes visible upon getting hit.

Enemies.name: Tumor
Enemies.description:
Moves around the room diagonally, occasionally firing 6 blood shots in
        all directions. Fires more often upon getting damaged.

Enemies.name: Planetoid
Enemies.description:
Moves around the room diagonally, occasionally firing blood shots that
        orbit itself. Fires more shots and has a chance to send its ring of
        shots outward upon taking damage.

Enemies.name: Camillo Jr.
Enemies.description:
Moves around the room diagonally, occasionally firing Technology lasers
        towards Isaac. Fires more often upon getting damaged.

Enemies.name: Psy Tumor
Enemies.description:
Moves around the room diagonally, occasionally firing 6 homing shots in
        all directions. Fires more often upon getting damaged.

Enemies.name: Poofer
Enemies.description:
Slowly floats toward Isaac, swells up and fire 6 blood shots in all
        directions upon taking damage. Explodes upon death, healing nearby
        enemies and leaving a big puddle of red creep.

Enemies.name: Nerve Ending
Enemies.description: Static enemy which acts as a meat shield.

Enemies.name: Nerve Ending 2
Enemies.description: Static enemy which whips at Isaac if he gets too close.

Enemies.name: Bishop
Enemies.description:
Shields all enemies in the room, preventing them from taking damage.
        Fires shots in the cardinal directions when it takes damage.

Enemies.name: One Tooth
Enemies.description:
Follows Isaac and periodically dashes towards him when it gets close.
        Deals contact damage.

Enemies.name: Fat Bat
Enemies.description:
Slowly flies towards Isaac. Tries to align itself diagonally to Isaac
        and shoots at him when in that alignment.

Enemies.name: Gurgling
Enemies.description:
Charges towards Isaac when he lines up with them, leaving a trail of Red
        Creep and shooting 6 blood shots.

Enemies.name: Goat
Enemies.description:
Wanders around the room. Occasionally moves toward Isaac, either firing
        blood shots at him or charging if he lines up on either side of it.

Enemies.name: Black Goat
Enemies.description:
Wanders around the room. Occasionally moves toward Isaac, either firing
        blood shots at him or charging if he lines upon either side of it. Can
        also fire thinBrimstonelasers in the cardinal directions, along with all other Black Goats in
        the room.

Enemies.name: Cultist
Enemies.description:
Creates an indestructible, homingPurple Ballat the start of the room and follows it around, occasionally leaving it
        to revive enemies that have died in the current room.

Enemies.name: Blood Cultist
Enemies.description:
Wanders around the room and fires a line of blood shots and creep if
        Isaac is on either side of it. Can summons bone traps that temporarily
        ensnare Isaac if he walks into them.

Enemies.name: Grub
Enemies.description:
Erratically moves around the room likeLarry Jr.and charges
        at Isaac when he gets within its line of sight. SpawnsMaggots,Chargers, orSpittiesupon death, one for
        each of its segments.

Enemies.name: Wall Creep
Enemies.description:
Crawls along walls to try to line up with Isaac and shoots three blood
        shots in a line.

Enemies.name: Soy Creep
Enemies.description:
Slowly crawls along walls to try to line up with Isaac and shoots a
        stream of shots seemingly affected bySoy Milk.

Enemies.name: Tainted Soy Creep
Enemies.description:
Slowly crawls along walls to try to line up with Isaac and shoots a 4
        diagonal streams ofSoy Milkshots.

Enemies.name: Rage Creep
Enemies.description:
Slowly crawls along walls to try to line up with Isaac and shoots a
        Brimstone laser.

Enemies.name: Blind Creep
Enemies.description: Randomly crawls along walls and shoots three spread blood shots.

Enemies.name: The Thing
Enemies.description:
Crawls along a wall and attempts to line up with Isaac, then spits a
        line of damaging Red Creep.

Enemies.name: Round Worm
Enemies.description:
Pops out of the ground in random locations and spits a blood shot at
        Isaac if he is in sight.

Enemies.name: Tube Worm
Enemies.description:
Pops out of the ground in random locations and fires a long-range spray
        of arcing shots where Isaac will be.

Enemies.name: Tainted Round Worm
Enemies.description:
Pops out of the ground in random locations alongside several tail ends.
        The head fires a large blood shot that splits into a radial burst of 8
        blood shots, while the tail ends shoot normal blood shots.

Enemies.name: Tainted Tube Worm
Enemies.description:
Pops out of the ground in random locations, spitting 4 explosive shots
        towards Isaac.

Enemies.name: Night Crawler
Enemies.description:
Pops out of the ground in random locations and fires four short-range
        shots that spiral outwards if Isaac is in sight.

Enemies.name: Roundy
Enemies.description:
Pops out of the ground in random locations, creating a small rock wave.
        Fires an explosive Ipecac shot at Isaac if he is in sight.

Enemies.name: Ulcer
Enemies.description:
Pops out of the ground in random locations and spawns a Dart Fly if
        Isaac is in sight. Fires a blood shot after spawning 6 Dart Flies.

Enemies.name: Fire Worm
Enemies.description:
Pops out of the ground in random locations in the lava and fires one
        flame at Isaac.

Enemies.name: Mole
Enemies.description:
Burrows towards Isaac and jumps out the ground to fire 3 blood shots at
        him.

Enemies.name: Tainted Mole
Enemies.description:
Dig towards Isaac and release a ring of rock waves. Fires 3 blood shots
        at Isaac 4 times.

Enemies.name: Lil' Haunt
Enemies.description:
Floats toward Isaac and occasionally fires a blood shot at him,
        predicting his movements.

Enemies.name: Polty
Enemies.description: Picks up and throws rocks and props at Isaac.

Enemies.name: Kineti
Enemies.description: Uses telekinesis to pick up and throw rocks and obstacles at Isaac.

Enemies.name: Dust
Enemies.description:
Follows Isaac, and is only visible when close to Isaac. Will begin to
        speed up when they are visible. Teleports away after taking enough
        damage.

Enemies.name: Dukie
Enemies.description: Flies around the room diagonally, occasionally spitting out 1-2Dart Flies.

Enemies.name: Meatball
Enemies.description:
Slides around the room. If Isaac is in sight, it will stop to spew a
        fountain of short-range blood shots in all directions or to spit a line
        of damagingRed Creeptowards
        Isaac. Spawns aHostupon death.

Enemies.name: Ministro
Enemies.description:
Hops around randomly and hop towards Isaac when he gets close,
        occasionally spitting out a cluster of disorganized shots.

Enemies.name: Fistuloid
Enemies.description:
Flies towards Isaac in an erratic waving motion, periodically firing a
        blood shot towards Isaac that also knocks itself back. Upon death, fires
        a worm that flies off screen.

Enemies.name: Fly Trap
Enemies.description:
Floats towards Isaac, with 3Attack Fliescircling
        around it. Coughs up additional Attack Flies and releases gas to launch
        the Attack Flies outwards.

Enemies.name: Poot Mine
Enemies.description:
Creates a gas cloud and propels itself away from Isaac when it gets hit
        non-consecutively. Explodes on death, detonating all the gas clouds it
        created.

Enemies.name: Bombgagger
Enemies.description:
Spits up aGiga Bomband runs
        away from it.

Enemies.name: Flesh Maiden
Enemies.description: Vaguely flies towards Isaac in curved swooping motions.

Enemies.name: Morningstar
Enemies.description:
Floats toward Isaac to deal contact damage while Isaac is moving,
        gaining speed the longer Isaac continues moving. Stops moving when Isaac
        stops moving.

Enemies.name: Needle
Enemies.description: Pops out of the ground and lunges towards Isaac, dealing contact damage.

Enemies.name: Pasty
Enemies.description:
Pops out of the ground and lunges toward Isaac, dealing contact damage
        and firing four shots in the ordinal directions.

Enemies.name: Fissure
Enemies.description:
Jumps out of pits and bounces around the room. Spawns endlessly from
        pits until room clear. Do not need to be killed to clear room.

Enemies.name: Portal
Enemies.description:
Spawns various enemies from the current floor until it either vanishes
        or is killed.

Enemies.name: Lil Portal
Enemies.description: Spawns fly and spider enemies until it is destroyed.

Enemies.name: Henry
Enemies.description: Flushes itself away shortly after Isaac enters the room.

Enemies.name: Stone Grimace
Enemies.description:
Stationary and invulnerable monster that occasionally fires a blood shot
        at Isaac. Stops firing when room is cleared.

Enemies.name: Vomit Grimace
Enemies.description:
Stationary and invulnerable monster that occasionally fires an Ipecac
        shot at Isaac. Stops firing when room is cleared.

Enemies.name: Triple Grimace
Enemies.description:
Stationary and invulnerable monster that occasionally fires a triple
        shot at Isaac. Stops firing when room is cleared.

Enemies.name: Stone Eye
Enemies.description:
Stationary and invulnerable monster that constantly rotates and fires a
        flickering Technology laser. Stops firing when the room is cleared.

Enemies.name: Constant Stone Shooter
Enemies.description:
Stationary and invulnerable monster that continuously fires shots in a
        single direction.

Enemies.name: Cross Stone Shooter
Enemies.description:
Stationary and invulnerable monster that continuously fires shots in
        four directions, alternating between cardinal and ordinal.

Enemies.name: Brimstone Head
Enemies.description:
Stationary and invulnerable monster that fires Brimstone beams in a
        specific direction.

Enemies.name: Gaping Maw
Enemies.description:
Stationary and invulnerable monster that sucks Isaac towards it, along
        with Isaac's tears and enemy projectiles.

Enemies.name: Broken Gaping Maw
Enemies.description:
Stationary and invulnerable monster that sucks Isaac towards it, along
        with Isaac's tears and enemy projectiles. Alternates between active and
        inactive every couple of seconds. Has a stronger attraction power than a
        regular Gaping Maw.

Enemies.name: Quake Grimace
Enemies.description:
Stationary and invulnerable monster that jumps and fires a line of rocks
        in one direction upon landing.

Enemies.name: Bomb Grimace
Enemies.description: Stationary and invulnerable monster that keeps a singleThrowable Bombspawned.

Enemies.name: Peep Eye
Enemies.description:
Invulnerable enemy that floats diagonally over obstacles and bounces off
        of walls, blocking tears and dealing contact damage. Spawned byPeepas apart of his fight.

Enemies.name: Bloat Eye
Enemies.description:
Invulnerable enemy that floats diagonally over obstacles and bounces off
        of walls, blocking tears and dealing contact damage. Spawned byThe Bloatas apart of
        his fight.

Enemies.name: Mockulus
Enemies.description:
Invulnerable enemy that rapidly floats diagonally over obstacles and
        bounces off of walls, blocking tears and dealing contact damage. They
        can only move while Isaac is shooting.

Enemies.name: Poky
Enemies.description:
Slides around the room aimlessly, damaging Isaac by contact. Disappears
        when the room is cleared.

Enemies.name: Slide
Enemies.description:
Quickly slides towards Isaac when he gets in its line of sight, then
        moves slowly back to its original position. Cannot be destroyed.

Enemies.name: Wall Hugger
Enemies.description:
Moves around the room likeGuts,
        damaging Isaac by contact. Cannot be destroyed.

Enemies.name: Grudge
Enemies.description:
Quickly slides towards Isaac when he gets in its line of sight. Cannot
        be destroyed.

Enemies.name: Ball and Chain
Enemies.description:
Spike balls that rotate at the end of a chain attached to an obstacle.
        If the obstacle is destroyed, the ball will fly free around the room for
        a while.

Enemies.name: Spikeball
Enemies.description:
Spike balls that fly in a line either horizontally or vertically,
        bouncing off walls and obstacles.

Enemies.name: Singe's Ball
Enemies.description:
Spawned exclusively as apartSinge's boss fight and used in
        his attacks. They can be pushed around and launched with explosions.

Enemies.name: Pitfall
Enemies.description:
Invulnerable and stationary enemy which Isaac falls into when walked
        over, taking damage and popping back out after a short delay.

Enemies.name: Suction Pitfall
Enemies.description:
Invulnerable and stationary enemy which sucks Isaac towards itself.
        Isaac falls into it when walked over, taking damage and popping back out
        after a short delay.

Enemies.name: Teleport Pitfall
Enemies.description:
Invulnerable and stationary enemy which Isaac falls into when walked
        over, taking damage and popping back out at a random location after a
        short delay.

Enemies.name: Death Scythe
Enemies.description: Stays stationary for a few seconds, then homes in on Isaac.

Enemies.name: Ultra Death Scythe
Enemies.description: Stays stationary for a moment, then travels in straight lines towardsUltra Death.

Enemies.name: Corn Mine
Enemies.description:
Goes off when destroyed or after some time, then releases a cloud of
        poisonous gas and fires corny shots in eight directions.

Enemies.name: Siren Minion
Enemies.description:
Spawned in automatically charmed byThe Siren. Orbits the
        boss and fires projectiles towards Isaac.

Enemies.name: Siren Helper
Enemies.description:
Spawned in byThe Sirenand takes the
        form and control of all of her charmed familiars.

Enemies.name: Dark Ball
Enemies.description: Floats towards Isaac, doing contact damage.

Enemies.name: Purple Ball
Enemies.description: Floats towards Isaac, doing contact damage.

Enemies.name: Visage Plasma
Enemies.description:
Floats in diagonal directions, doing contact damage. Spawned byThe Visageand used in
        its phase 3 attacks.

Enemies.name: Ultra Pestilence Fly Ball
Enemies.description: Floats towards Isaac, doing contact damage and spawningUltra Pestilence Fliesupon taking damage.

Enemies.name: Ultra Greed Coin (Spinner)
Enemies.description: Spins around the room, dealing contact damage.

Enemies.name: Ultra Greed Coin (Key)
Enemies.description:
Spins on itself and opens a golden door around the room if not
        destroyed, spawning hordes ofGreed Gapers.

Enemies.name: Ultra Greed Coin (Bomb)
Enemies.description: Spins on itself and explodes with a large radius if not destroyed.

Enemies.name: Ultra Greed Coin (Heart)
Enemies.description:
Spins on itself and heals Ultra Greed for 13.125 HP each if not
        destroyed.

Enemies.name: Dummy
Enemies.description:
Only encounterable throughDebug Console,
        it is immobile, harmless, and used to track Isaac's damage.

Items.misc_unlock: Using 4 xiii - death cards

Items.item_desc: Eye in the back of your head

Making a super bandage girl
Visiting 10 arcades
Killing the steven boss for the first time
Killing mom (mom's foot or mom's heart) using the bible
Collecting two of the following items: bob's rotten head, dead cat, cricket's head, tammy's head
Destroying 10 tinted rocks
Collecting 3 'mom' items in one playthrough
Playing the blood donation machine 30 times

Items.misc_unlock: Collecting both key pieces #1 & #2 for the first time

Evil up + DMG up + fear shot
Let's slow this down a bit

Items.item_desc: Some stats up, some stats down

Items.misc_unlock: Donating 10 pennies to the shop
Donating 50 pennies to the shop
Picking up 2 of the following items: roid rage, the virus, growth hormones, experimental treatment or speed ball
Donating 150 pennies to the shop

Items.item_desc: Evil up + your enemies will pay
We worked out all the kinks
He wants to take your life

Donating 400 pennies to the shop

Completing all post-it note marks in hard mode with the lost character

I can't believe it's not butter bean!

Complete 7 daily challenges (30 on console)
