Speed up + your feet feel stronger
DMG up + range up + controlled tears
A king's fortune... but at what cost?

Items.misc_unlock: Opening mom's box in the home floor

Items.item_desc: Tears up. A mind changing experience!
Items.item_charge: Starts at 1 second, increasing by every time you use it. After 10 uses it stops auto recharging.

Items.misc_unlock: Spending 40+ coins in the same shop

Items.item_charge: 12 rooms (Can be used with partial charges)

Items.misc_unlock: Getting all hard mode completion marks for the 17 non-tainted characters
Completing every post-it note for every character, including the tainted characters

Items.item_charge: 1 room (Can only be used once per floor)

Items.misc_unlock: Killing hornfel before he can escape after breaking his minecart

Items.item_desc: Beat the juice out of them!

Items.misc_unlock: Allowing baby plum to escape instead of killing her

Items.item_desc: I can see see the future future future
Isaac and his mother lived alone in a small house on a hill

Trinkets.trinket_desc: It calls out to its brothers

Trinkets.misc_unlock: Blowing up 20 shop keepers (this includes the ones in the secret room)
Playing the shell game in the arcade 100 times

Trinkets.trinket_desc: The left hand path reaps dark rewards

Trinkets.misc_unlock: Getting a 5-win streak in daily challenges (must have a score of above 0 on the score screen)

Trinkets.trinket_desc: Thats a hard nut to crack!

Trinkets.misc_unlock: Blowing up doors and secret room walls 50 times
Having a lot of blue flies at once
Having two items or effects that grant homing shots at once (e.g. spoon bender, telepathy for dummies, i - the magician)
Bombing the skull left by the siren boss after her death

Trinkets.trinket_desc: Luck way up. Don't lose it!

Trinkets.misc_unlock: Donating to a battery beggar until he pays out with an item 5 times

Collecting three of the following in the same run: magic 8 ball, tiny planet, crystal ball, star of bethlehem or any of the astrology-related items (e.g. aries, cancer, capricorn, leo etc.). the item called zodiac does not count.

Trinkets.trinket_desc: Walk the path of the saint
Walk the path of the wicked

Tarot.name: 0 - The Fool
Tarot.description: Teleports Isaac back to the starting room of the floor that he is currently on.

Tarot.name: I - The Magician
Tarot.message: May you never miss your goal
Tarot.description: Grantshoming tearsfor the current room.Grantshoming tearsand +3Rangefor the current room.

Tarot.name: II - The High Priestess
Tarot.description: Mom's dismembered leg stomps on the enemy with the most health, dealing 300 damage and destroying obstacles in the area. If used in an empty room or during theMomfight, stomps Isaac instead.Isaac can move to avoid the stomp.

Tarot.name: III - The Empress
Tarot.description: Triggers theWhore of Babyloneffect (+1.5Damage, +0.3Speed) for the current room, regardless of Isaac's health total.

Tarot.name: IV - The Emperor
Tarot.description: Teleports Isaac into theBoss Room.

Tarot.name: V - The Hierophant
Tarot.description: Drops 2 fullSoul Heartson the ground.

Tarot.name: VI - The Lovers
Tarot.message: May you prosper and be in good health
Tarot.description: Drops 2 fullRed Heartson the ground.

Tarot.name: VII - The Chariot
Tarot.description: Givesinvulnerabilityand +0.28speedfor six seconds, removing the ability to shoot tears and replacing it with the ability to deal contact damage to enemies.

Tarot.name: VIII - Justice
Tarot.description: Drops a random type ofHeart,Key,Bomb, andCoinpickup on the ground.

Tarot.name: IX - The Hermit
Tarot.message: May you see what life has to offer
Tarot.description: Teleports Isaac to theShop.

Tarot.name: X - Wheel of Fortune
Tarot.description: Creates aSlot MachineorFortune Telling Machinenear Isaac.

Tarot.name: XI - Strength
Tarot.description: Grants the effects ofMagic Mushroom(minus the health restoration) for one room. The addedRed Heart containeris not removed if doing so would kill Isaac.

Tarot.name: XII - The Hanged Man
Tarot.description: Grantsflightfor the duration of the room.

Tarot.name: XIII - Death
Tarot.message: Lay waste to all that oppose you
Tarot.description: Deals 40 damage to all enemies in the room.

Tarot.name: XIV - Temperance
Tarot.message: May you be pure in heart
Tarot.description: Creates aBlood Donation Machinenear Isaac.Spawns aDevil Beggarinstead inGreed mode.

Tarot.name: XV - The Devil
Tarot.message: Revel in the power of darkness
Tarot.description: Grants +2Damagefor the current room.

Tarot.name: XVI - The Tower
Tarot.description: Drops 6Troll Bombsrandomly around the room.

Tarot.name: XVII - The Stars
Tarot.message: May you find what you desire
Tarot.description: Teleports Isaac to theTreasure Room. Randomly chooses a Treasure Room if there is an activeCurse of the Labyrinth.If there is aPlanetarium, teleports Isaac there instead.

Tarot.name: XVIII - The Moon
Tarot.message: May you find all you have lost
Tarot.description: Teleports Isaac to theSecret Room. Opens one random wall inside the Secret Room, so Isaac can leave even if he doesn't have anyBombs. Randomly chooses a Secret Room if there are multiple (viaFragmented Cardand/orLuna).

Tarot.name: XIX - The Sun
Tarot.message: May the light heal and enlighten you
Tarot.description: Restores Isaac to fullhealth, deals 100 damage to all enemies in the room, and reveals the map for the current floor, except for theSuper Secret RoomandUltra Secret Room.RemovesCurse of Darknessfor the current floor.

Tarot.name: XX - Judgement
Tarot.description: Spawns aBeggaror aDevil Beggarnear Isaac. Has a 2% chance to spawn aBattery Bum,Rotten Beggar,Key Master, orBomb Buminstead.

Tarot.name: XXI - The World
Tarot.description: Reveals the entire floor, except for theSuper Secret RoomandUltra Secret Room.

Flipped Tarot.name: 0 - The Fool?
Flipped Tarot.description:
Drops allHeartsandpickupsIsaac currently
        possesses on the floor, leaving Isaac at half a heart. Pickups may be
        dropped as items such asA QuarterandBoom!.

Flipped Tarot.name: I - The Magician?
Flipped Tarot.message: May no harm come to you
Flipped Tarot.description: Grants a repelling blue aura for one minute, likeThe Soulbut stronger and with a wider area of effect.

Flipped Tarot.name: II - The High Priestess?
Flipped Tarot.description:
Mom's leg starts stomping down
        repeatedly (targeting Isaac, not the enemies) for one minute, like
        holdingBroken Shovel.

Flipped Tarot.name: III - The Empress?
Flipped Tarot.description:
Grants 2 temporaryRed Heart Containers, +1.5Fire Rate, and -0.1Speedfor one
        minute, along withMagdalene's hairstyle. The effect does not stack with itself. When the effect
        ends, if the removal of the Heart Containers would kill Isaac, he is
        left with one instead.

Flipped Tarot.name: IV - The Emperor?
Flipped Tarot.message: May you find a worthy opponent
Flipped Tarot.description:
Teleports Isaac into an extraBoss Roomfrom the
        boss pool two floors deeper than the current floor (but never a final
        boss). The boss will drop a reward. Exiting the room returns Isaac to
        where he used the card.

Flipped Tarot.name: V - The Hierophant?
Flipped Tarot.description:
Drops 2Bone Heartson the
        ground.

Flipped Tarot.name: VI - The Lovers?
Flipped Tarot.message: May your heart shatter to pieces
Flipped Tarot.description: Creates a random item from the current room's item pool. Turns oneRed Heart Containeror twoSoul Heartsinto aBroken Heart.

Flipped Tarot.name: VII - The Chariot?
Flipped Tarot.description:
Isaac becomes an invincible statue with 4 fire rate for 10 seconds. The
        statue can be nudged slightly by moving and is affected by knockback.

Flipped Tarot.name: VIII - Justice?
Flipped Tarot.message: May your sins come back to torment you
Flipped Tarot.description: Creates 2 to 4Locked Chestsnear Isaac.

Flipped Tarot.name: IX - The Hermit?
Flipped Tarot.message: May you see the value of all things in life
Flipped Tarot.description:
Turns items and pickups in the room intoCoins, matching their normal
        shop price. If there is nothing to sell, drops aPenny.

Flipped Tarot.name: X - Wheel of Fortune?
Flipped Tarot.description: Invokes a randomDice Roomeffect.

Flipped Tarot.name: XI - Strength?
Flipped Tarot.description:
All enemies in the room are weakened, becomingslowand
        taking double damage. The effect lasts up to one minute or until the
        room is left.

Flipped Tarot.name: XII - The Hanged Man?
Flipped Tarot.message: May your greed know no bounds
Flipped Tarot.description:
Isaac turns visually intoKeeperfor 30 seconds, with triple shot and -0.1Speed. Killed enemies drop
        randomCoins.

Flipped Tarot.name: XIII - Death?
Flipped Tarot.message: May life spring forth from the fallen
Flipped Tarot.description:
Creates afriendlyBonyor temporary bone orbital for
        each enemy killed in the current room.

Flipped Tarot.name: XIV - Temperance?
Flipped Tarot.description:
Forces Isaac to eat 5 randomPillsin quick
        succession.

Flipped Tarot.name: XV - The Devil?
Flipped Tarot.message: Bask in the light of your mercy
Flipped Tarot.description: InvokesThe Bible(which can killMom). GrantsFlightand spawns aSeraphimfamiliar for 30 seconds.

Flipped Tarot.name: XVI - The Tower?
Flipped Tarot.description:
Creates 7 clusters of randomrocksand other obstacles.
        Spawned clusters will often containtinted rocks, with the possibility of finding more than one in the same room. The
        pathways between exits can't be blocked.

Flipped Tarot.name: XVII - The Stars?
Flipped Tarot.description:
Removes Isaac's oldest passive item (ignoring starting items) and
        creates 2 random items from the current room's item pool. Does nothing
        if Isaac has no items.

Flipped Tarot.name: XVIII - The Moon?
Flipped Tarot.description: Teleports Isaac to theUltra Secret Room. The pathway back to the normal rooms will be made ofRed Rooms.

Flipped Tarot.name: XIX - The Sun?
Flipped Tarot.message: May the darkness swallow all around you
Flipped Tarot.description:
GainSpirit of the Nightand +1.5Damagefor the
        current floor. Turns Isaac's Red Hearts into Bone Hearts, but they
        revert once the effect ends. Also causesCurse of Darknessthat cannot
        be dispelled.

Flipped Tarot.name: XX - Judgement?
Flipped Tarot.message: May you redeem those found wanting
Flipped Tarot.description: Creates aShop Restock Machinenear Isaac.

Flipped Tarot.name: XXI - The World?
Flipped Tarot.description: Creates a trap door which always leads to aCrawl Space.

Playing Cards.name: 2 of Clubs
Playing Cards.description: Doubles Isaac'sBombs. If he has no bombs, gives him 2 instead.

Playing Cards.name: 2 of Diamonds
Playing Cards.description: Doubles Isaac'sPenny. If he has no coins, gives him 2 instead.

Playing Cards.name: 2 of Spades
Playing Cards.description: Doubles Isaac'sKeys. If he has no keys, gives him 2 instead.

Playing Cards.name: 2 of Hearts
Playing Cards.description: Doubles Isaac's current number ofRed Hearts. Doesn't add new Red Heart containers, just fills empty ones. If Isaac has only empty Red Heart containers, he is healed for 1 Red Heart.DoublesTainted Bethany's Blood Charges.

Playing Cards.name: Ace of Clubs
Playing Cards.description: Turns allPickups,Chests, andnon-boss enemies in the room into randomBombpickups, includingTroll Bombs.

Playing Cards.name: Ace of Diamonds
Playing Cards.description: Turns allPickups,Chests, andnon-boss enemies in the room into randomCoinpickups.

Playing Cards.name: Ace of Spades
Playing Cards.unlock: DefeatThe Lambwithout taking Hearts, Coins, or Bombs through the entire run. Letting certain familiars (e.g.Bum Friend,Dark Bum,BumboorLil Portal) or bosses (e.g.Bumbino) pick up the consumables fails this condition as well.
Playing Cards.description: Turns allPickups,Chests, andnon-boss enemies in the room into randomKeypickups.

Playing Cards.name: Ace of Hearts
Playing Cards.unlock: Complete a Chapter (floors I and II) afterBasement, start-to-finish, with only half a Heart total (can useThe Lost)
Playing Cards.description: Turns allPickups,Chests, andnon-boss enemies in the room into randomHearts.

Playing Cards.name: Joker
Playing Cards.description: Teleports Isaac to theDevil RoomorAngel Room.

Playing Cards.name: Suicide King
Playing Cards.description: Kills Isaac and spawns lots of Pickups, items, and/or Chests in the same room.

Magic Cards.name: Chaos Card
Magic Cards.description: Throws the card in the direction Isaac is moving, which opens doors, breaks obstacles, and instantly kills any enemy in its path.

Magic Cards.name: Huge Growth
Magic Cards.unlock: Increase in size 5 times in a single run viaMagic Mushroom, "One makes you larger" pills,XI - Strength, etc.
Magic Cards.description: For the current room, makes Isaac larger, allows him to crushobstacleshe walks on, and grants +7 flatDamageand +30Range.For the current room, makes Isaac larger, allows him to crushobstacleshe walks on, and grants +7 flatDamageand +3Range.

Magic Cards.name: Era Walk
Magic Cards.unlock: Add both theBroken Watchand theStop Watchto yourcollection
Magic Cards.description: For the current room, enemies are slowed, Isaac's speed is increased by 0.50, and his shot speed is decreased by 1.00.

Extra Cards.name: Credit Card
Extra Cards.description: Makes allpickupsanditemsthat cost money or health in the room free.

Extra Cards.name: Rules Card
Extra Cards.description: Displays a cryptic statement on the screen, similar to aFortune Telling Machine. These messages (often) provide hints on bosses, bonus areas, etc.

Extra Cards.name: ? Card
Extra Cards.description: When used, copies the effect of Isaac's currently heldactivated collectible.

Extra Cards.name: A Card Against Humanity
Extra Cards.description: Covers the entire room withPoop. The process is not instant, and the room will not get filled if Isaac leaves before it's done filling.

Extra Cards.name: Get out of Jail Free Card
Extra Cards.description: Upon use, opens all doors in the current room, exactly likeDad's Key.

Extra Cards.name: Holy Card
Extra Cards.description: Grants a shield that blocks the next hostile damage that would be taken in the currentroom. Has a chance to spawn another Holy Card on use.Grants a shield that blocks the next hostile damage that would be taken.

Extra Cards.name: Wild Card
Extra Cards.description: When used, copies the effect of the most recently usedPill,Card, Rune, Soul Stone, oractivated item.

Transformations.name: Guppy
Transformations.description: Isaac turns into his cat Guppy and gains the ability to fly. Every time you successfully hit with a tear, a blue fly will spawn (In Repentance this was nerfed to 50% of tears that hit). Taking any three of the following items will trigger the Guppy transformation.

Transformations.name: Beelzebub
Transformations.description: Isaac turns into a human fly and gains the ability to fly. This transformation will turn most types of flies into friendly blue attack flies. Taking any three of the following items will trigger the Lord of the Flies transformation.

Transformations.name: Mom
Transformations.description: Isaac turns into his mother, giving him a knife which is attached to his butt and cannot be fired. Taking any three items in this list will give Isaac the Mom transformation.

Transformations.name: Leviathan
Transformations.description: Isaac turns into a tentacled monster, gaining 2 black hearts and the ability to fly. Taking any three items in this list will give Isaac the Leviathan transformation.

Transformations.name: Seraphim
Transformations.description: Isaac turns into a faceless angel, gaining 3 soul hearts and permanent flight. Taking any three items in this list will give Isaac the Seraphim transformation.

Transformations.name: Bob
Transformations.description: Isaac turns into Bob (Sloth) and will now leave a trail of green poisonous creep as he walks. Taking any three items in this list will give Isaac the Bob transformation.

Transformations.name: Fun Guy
Transformations.description: Isaac turns into a living Mushroom and gains +1 HP. Taking any three items in this list will give Isaac the Mushroom transformation.

Transformations.name: Conjoined
Transformations.description: Isaac grows two tumors on his face, which will fire diagonally in addition to Isaac's normal tears. This transformation is also a -0.3 damage down and -0.3 tears down.Taking any three items in this list will give Isaac the Conjoined transformation.

Transformations.name: Spun
Transformations.description: Isaac turns into a buff berserker gaining +2 Damage, +0.15 Speed and spawns a random pill on the floor. Taking any three items in this list will give Isaac the Drugs transformation.

Transformations.name: Oh Crap
Transformations.description: Isaac turns into a giant walking turd and he can now heal half a red heart each time a pile of poop is destroyed. Taking any three items in this list will give Isaac the Poop transformation.

Transformations.name: Super Bum
Transformations.description: Picking up all 3 bum familiars will combine them and transform into SUPER BUM. Super Bum will pick up any of the other bum's pickups and drop double rewards. The three items required are:

Rooms.descripcion: Closets are rare, small, dead end Normal Rooms. They will often contain a unique arrangement of items, objects, or pickups.

Boss Rooms contain one of the manyBosses, with victory granting Isaac an item from theBoss pool,hearts(depending on difficulty), and a trap door leading to the next level. It always spawns in the room that's as far from the starting room as possible. Mini-Boss Rooms are identical in appearance to normal Rooms and contain one of theSeven Deadly Sins.

A Treasure Room, or Item Room, is guaranteed to appear on all floors fromBasement1 toDepths2. From Basement 2 and on, this Room requires akeyto enter. The Room contains one item from theTreasure Room item pool. Variousobstaclesmay be present, and occasionallyFliesorGreed Gapers/Bulbswill be present. This Room has a small chance to contain two items from the treasure pool that can both be collected, and averysmall chance of containing no item pedestal at all, instead containing one poop pile, 3Attack Flies, and variouspickups, including onetrinket. OnDownpour/Dross,Mines/Ashpit, andMausoleum/Gehenna, Treasure Rooms will always contain at least two items, with one of them being hidden, similar toCurse of the Blind. Golden Treasure Rooms always require one key to open inGreed Mode. Golden Treasure Rooms can generate in theWomb/Uteroif theBloody Crowntrinket is equipped when the floor is generated. Golden Treasure Rooms can generate inSheolwith theWicked Crowntrinket equipped, and can generate in theCathedralwith theHoly Crowntrinket equipped.  Silver Treasure Rooms are Rooms found inGreed Mode. They always contain one item from theGreed "Boss" Item Pool, and require no keys to open, being open from the start of the floor. Appears inGreedier Modeas well, acting exactly the same way. When carrying theDevil's Crowntrinket, any newly found or not walked into Treasure Room becomes a Red Treasure Room, which contain items from the Devil Room pool for the price of heart containers. The prices are the same as normally required in regularDevil Deals.

Planetariums are similar to Treasure Rooms, but only contain one powerful celestial item belonging to thePlanetarium (Item Pool), items exclusive to Planetarium Rooms. Planetariums have an additive and higher chance of spawning if the player avoids walking into Treasure Rooms.

Shops require a key to open. They sell various items and pickups in exchange for coins. Shops start at level 0 and only sell 2 things, but Shops at higher levels sell more things. They can be upgraded through theDonation Machine, which can be commonly found in the Shops and sometimes in anArcade.Shops also have a chance of being replaced by a miniboss Room containingGreedorSuper Greed. Shops can generate in theWomb/Uteroif theSilver Dollartrinket is equipped when the floor is generated. The Shop spawned on the first floor is free to enter. Shops can generate inSheolwith theWicked Crowntrinket equipped, and can generate in theCathedralwith theHoly Crowntrinket equipped. Has a new Door, no longer sharing a Door with Libraries.

These Rooms are locked and require one coin to be opened. Arcades can only spawn on even floors (Basement II, Caves II, Depths II, Womb II, etc) if the previous floor was completed with 5 or more coins.Arcadescan containmachines,beggars, and other objects. Arcades will spawn on the first floor of the alternate chapters (DownpourI,MinesI,MausoleumI,CorpseI).

Challenge Rooms will only generate if Isaac has full health upon entering the first floor of aChapter. Challenge Rooms can only be entered if Isaac's total health (red, black, and soul hearts) is equal to or greater than his number of heart containers. Upon picking up its contents, Isaac has to fight three waves of enemies.  Boss Challenge Rooms will only generate if Isaac has full health upon entering the second floor of aChapter. They also can only be entered if Isaac has one or less red heart. Its contents are similar to the Normal Challenge Room, but upon picking up its contents, Isaac has to fight two waves ofBossesinstead of normal monsters. Boss Challenge Rooms now can only be entered normally if Isaac's total health (red, black, and soul hearts) is equal to or less than 1 full heart, but now always contain an item fromthe Boss Item Pool.

Curse Rooms are special rooms with spikes on the door that hurt Isaac when entering and exiting the Room. Curse Rooms can contain various things, ranging from enemies, red chests, to even pedestalitemsfrom theCurse Room Item Pool. However, Isaac doesn't take damage upon entering the room if he hasflight(still takes damage upon exiting).

Sacrifice Rooms are special rooms that have a chance to spawn aChestor other preset rewards after Isaac damages himself on the spikes featured at the center of the Room. Sacrifice Rooms have a higher chance to spawn if Isaac has more health to sacrifice (if Isaac's total health (red, black, and soul hearts) is equal to or greater than his number of heart containers). Sacrifice Rooms now can pay with a much wider variety of rewards. Has a new bloody door, replacing its old, generic one.
Secret Rooms must be bombed into, and are usually surrounded by 3 or 4 Rooms. Secret Rooms usually containShopkeepersand variouspickups.
Super Secret Rooms must be bombed into, and are only located next to one other non-special Room. They tend to spawn closer to the Boss Room. Super Secret Rooms can contain a variety ofpickups.

Ultra Secret Rooms are very secret rooms, found when venturing one Red Room outside the normal map using theRed Key,Crystal Key,Cracked Key,Soul of Cain, or by teleporting to it withXVIII - The Moon?. These map-expanding items allow you to create Red Rooms, and if correctly found, one of those new Red Rooms will have a Secret Room passageway to the Ultra Secret Room already opened. The Ultra Secret Room itself containsKeys,key blocks, and/orShopkeepers, and one item from theUltra Secret Room item poolfor its pedestal rewards.
Libraries require a key to be entered and can containbook items,cards,runes, andtrinkets. Has a new Door, no longer sharing a door with Shops.

These Rooms allow the player to make deals with theDevilby tradinghealthforitems. Devil Rooms can also containRed Chests,Black Hearts,spikes, ormonstersalong with its signature devil statue. They may also haveFire PlacesorRed Fire Placeswhich have a chance to dropCoins,Red Hearts, and more when extinguished. Devil Roomshave a chance to containKrampusrather than any items, if Krampus is unlocked.

Angel Rooms contain an angel statue and one or moreitemsto choose from,Soul Hearts, orEternal Hearts. The Angel Room has a chance to replace the Devil Room if certain conditions are met. They may also haveBlue Fire PlacesorPurple Fire Places, which have a chance to dropSoul Heartswhen extinguished. Can now have aConfessionalin them.
Vaults require two keys to open and can contain various things, ranging fromitemstoDonation Machines.
Dice Rooms require two keys to open. Depending on the number of pips imprinted on the face of the large red die embedded in the floor, stepping onto the center of the die activates aneffect.

Bedrooms require two bombs to open. Bedrooms contain a bed that can be used once to restore all of the player's health, or if they have no red hearts, they give you 3 soul heartsand add one charge to their active item. Depending on if the Bedroom is Clean or Dirty (the main difference being the state of the bed and wall color), bombing the center of the carpet will reveal acrawl space(Clean) or a trapdoor (Dirty) leading to the next floor.

These Rooms are entered through Trapdoors with ladders in them. They can rarely be found under destroyed rocks. They can also be found usingWe Need To Go Deeper!,Rune of Ehwaz, or under aClean Bedroom'srug. These Rooms are viewed from the side, rather than the top like the rest of the Rooms in the game. Crawl Spaces usually contain an item or variouspickups. Rarely, the Crawl Space will lead to aBlack Market. Black markets are accessed through Rare Crawl Spaces. These Rooms are 2 Rooms wide and haveshop itemsthat can all be bought for 1 heart container, likedevil deals. Black Markets also have a trapdoor to the next floor and variousmachinesorbeggars.

Angel Room Shops are special holy shops, accessed if Isaac hasThe Stairway. The Stairway will spawn a ladder in the starting room of each floor that leads to each floor's Angel Room shop, aShopthat sellsAngel deal items, has angel-related pickups, sometimes includes a coinbeggaror aConfessional, and always includes an angel statue. This ladder disappears upon leaving the room.

Secret shops are accessed by buying aMember Card, opening up a 'special' Shop Trapdoor that leads to the floor's underground shop. Secret shops have a wider variety of items and pickups, sold at various expensive prices.

Red Rooms are special rooms created when using theRed Key(and Red Key wisps spawned withBook of Virtues),Crystal Key,Cracked Key, or theSoul of Cain. The Red Key Rooms don't open without these items, and are spawned into existence at the closest red outline door when the item is used. The new Red Room can be a normal Room on this floor, or any special Room, aside from extra Ultra Secret Rooms and Boss Rooms. Red Rooms can't spawn where there aren't 4 connections out of the Room, not spawning if a touching room contains a bottomless pit on one wall, already is a secret room, or is a thin closet/hallway room. While inside a Red Room, the music of the floor will be slightly distorted. Red rooms can only be spawned in an 13x13 radius from the the center room of the map, or six rooms from the center room in any direction; any farther will lead to entering an I AM ERROR Room.

I AM ERROR Rooms have a small chance of being reached upon usingTelepills, and can be reached with other items such asUndefinedandRed Key. Every I AM ERROR Room contains a trapdoor to the next floor along with variouspickupsoritems. The only way out of an I AM ERROR Room is through the trapdoor or by teleporting out. UsingTeleport 2.0when all other rooms have been explored guarantees to be teleported in an I AM ERROR room. The I AM ERROR Room is a running gag within games that is a reference to the "I AM ERROR" easter egg in Zelda II: The Adventure of Link (1987)

If the player manages to beatMomin under 20 minutes from the start of the run (visually indicated by the clock icon that appears during the cutscene between floors), a crack will open in the wall of the Boss Room upon defeating her, allowing entry to a large Room with 2 or 4 item pedestals in the center or the corners, often blocked byrocksorspikes. Taking one of the presented items will destroy the others and begin the Boss Rush.

This long Room is only found in the starting Room ofChestandDark Room. Opening this door requires an item such asDad's Keyor the two key pieces fromAngels. Once the Room is entered, Isaac will have to face off againstMega Satan.

If the player manages to beatMom's HeartorIt Livesin under 30 minutes (visually indicated by the clock icon that appears during the cutscene between floors), a crack will open in the wall of the Boss Room upon defeating it, containing a room with a Trapdoor to???.
Mother's arena is accessible by a large pit in the ground in the Boss Room ofCorpseII. Dropping down into the pit leads to Mother's unique transforming boss room.

Exit Rooms are Rooms with the defining feature of having a Trapdoor/exit to the next Floor. Greed Exit Rooms start metal barred and unbombable, like miniboss rooms, but will be unbarred and accessible once ten waves of enemies are defeated. Exit Rooms may contain pickups, chests, and enemies. Greedier Exit Rooms are almost exactly the same as the Greed Mode Exit Room, except they take 11 rounds to open.

When unlocked, these Rooms appear attached to a Main Path Boss Room once theBossis defeated (or appear at the end of Alternate PathChapter). These Rooms contain an entrance to the Alternate Path Floors. These Rooms have different requirements to open them, based on theChapterthey are barring entrance to:  When unlocked, this room appears above the starting room of the second floor of Chapter 3, containing a trapdoor leading to a special version of the second floor of Chapter 3.5. This door can only be opened by obtaining and sacrificing eitherThe Polaroid,The Negative, orFaded Polaroid.

When unlocked, this room appears above the starting room of the second floor of Chapter 3, containing a trapdoor leading to a special version of the second floor of Chapter 3.5. This door can only be opened by obtaining and sacrificing either The Polaroid, The Negative, or (except in Rebirth)Faded Polaroid
Grave Rooms are Rooms that appear in theDark Roomwhich only contain 1-3Dirt Patches.The Forgottenis unlocked by reaching this room and digging withMom's Shovel.

The Mirror Room is a single special room found on the second floor of Chapter 1.5, containing a single mirror on either the left or right doorway location. This mirror can be broken by explosions, but also can be entered to explore theMirrored World, a replica of the current floor, to findKnife Piece 1. The mirror can only be entered byThe Lost,Tainted Lost,Tainted Forgotten, andTainted Jacob's ghost form. All other characters must touch the white fire which always generates on the second floor of Chapter 1.5 in order to temporarily become The Lost if they want to enter the mirror.

The Mine Cart Room is a single special room found on the second floor of Chapter 2.5 only if Isaac already hasKnife Piece 1. It contains a Yellow Button, a single minecart, a blocked door at the top of the room and occasionally some enemies. There are 2 other Yellow Buttons located randomly on the same floor and pressing all 3 repairs the minecart's track allowing access through the blocked door. Alternatively havingFlightand 2 bombs also allows access through the door. The area past the blocked door containsKnife Piece 2and a chase sequence withMother's Shadow. The door is permanently blocked after leaving the sub-area.

items.name: Heart(Corazn)
items.Descripcin: Ms comnmente conocidos comocorazones rojos(para diferenciarlos de los otros tipos de corazones), estos son unos de los objetos ms frecuentes de encontrar y la principal fuente de vida para la mayora de personajes. Restaura 2 puntos de vida (un contenedor de corazn entero) si hay un hueco para estos. Debido a la mecnica deThe Keeper, se convertir en dos moscas azules cada uno si apareces.

items.name: Half Heart(Medio Corazn)
items.Descripcin: Restaura 1 punto de vida (medio contenedor de corazn). Se convierte en una mosca azul si se esKeeper.

items.name: Soul Heart(Corazn de Alma)
items.Descripcin: Los corazones de alma son corazones ms especiales que pueden ser recogidos aunque se tengan los contenedores de vida llenos, aumentando la salud ms de lo normal. No solo eso, sino que no activan la reduccin de posibilidad de hacer pacto. Ellos no cuentan como contenedores de corazones. A partir deRebirth,se puede tener una barra de vida solamente conformada por estos, mientras que eljuego originalse muere si no se tiene ningn contenedor de corazones rojos.???yThe Soulnicamente usan este tipo de corazn como vida.

items.name: Key(Llave)
items.Descripcin: Las llaves son recolectables muy comunes. Esta llave ordinaria aumenta el contador de llaves por 1. Funcionan para abrir puertas cerradas, cofres dorados y bloques con candado.

items.name: Penny(Centavo)
items.Descripcin: Los centavos son el dinero que se usa en el juego. Esta simple moneda aumenta el contador por 1. Estos pueden ser usados para comprar en la tienda, usarlos en las mquinas que requieren dinero como la tragaperras o la mquina adivinadora, o drselos a los mendigos que pueden dar ms objetos a cambio. Tambin los centavos puede servir para curar aKeeperya que su vida depende de monedas.

items.name: Nickel(Nquel)
items.Descripcin: Los nqueles al igual que los centavos otorgan dinero, pero estos valen 5 centavos. Pueden remplazar a los centavos normales con suerte.

items.name: Bomb(Bomba)
items.Descripcin: Las bombas son objetos que pueden ser usados pulsando E. Estas explotan en un radio grande, daando todo (incluyendo al jugador) y destruyendo rocas, mquinas, cuidadores de tiendas y entradas a habitaciones secretas o puertas cerradas. Las bombas pueden servir bien como mtodo de ataque, ms especialmente si se tiene objetos que den a las bombas ms efectos comoSad BombsoMr. Mega.

items.name: Double Bomb(Doble Bomba)
items.Descripcin: Son bombas que aaden dos bombas en vez de una sola. Pueden remplazar a las bombas normales con suerte.BOGO Bombsremplaza todas las bombas normales por este tipo de bombas. TambinHumbling Bundlehace aparecer estas bombas en vez de las normales.

items.name: Troll Bomb(Bomba Trol)
items.Descripcin: Las bombas troles son bombas que no pueden ser recogidas pero pueden remplazar a las bombas normales. Las troll bombs ya aparecen activadas y terminan explotando por si solas. Si el jugador est cerca de una, esta intentar explotar ms rpido para daar al jugador. Si se tiene el trinketSafety Scissorsestas se convertiran en bombas normales antes de estallar.

items.name: Cards(Cartas)
items.Descripcin: Las cartas son recolectables que se pueden guardar. Solamente se puede guardar una carta (o pldora) o dos si se tieneDeep PocketsoStarter Deck. Se pueden usar pulsando Q y cada una posee un efecto nico. Las runas cuentan como cartas.

items.name: Pills(Pldoras)
items.Descripcin: Las pldoras son iguales que las cartas, objetos que se pueden reservar en un espacio exclusivo para ambos y ser usados al pulsar Q. La diferencia entre pldoras y cartas es que las pldoras no muestran que efectos tienen hasta ser usadas por primera vez (a menos que se tengaPHD). Las pldoras nunca son iguales; cambian de efectos y apariencias al iniciar otra partida (las cuales depende de la semilla).

items.name: Eternal Heart(Corazn Eterno)
items.Descripcin: Los corazones eternos son corazones que al ser recogidos se aadirn al primer contenedor o al ltimo corazn de alma (si no se tiene contenedores). Estos pueden ser daados, desapareciendo. Pero si no desaparecen y se pasa al siguiente piso, se transformar en un contenedor de corazones (o un corazn de alma si se es???oThe Soul). Tambin si se recoge otro corazn eterno mientras se tiene uno ya, directamente har aparecer el nuevo corazn. Pese a sertcnicamentemedio corazn eterno, se le llama corazn eterno.

items.name: Golden Key(Llave Dorada)
items.Descripcin: Si se consigue, el icono de la llave plateada cambiar por una dorada. Mientras se tenga esta, todo lo que requiera llave ser abierto si gastar ninguna, ahorrando. Tu llave dorada desaparecer al pasar al siguiente piso.

items.name: Dime(Dime;10 Centavos)
items.Descripcin: Los dimes valen 10 centavos y son ms raros de hacer aparecer. Siendo la moneda con ms valor, puede remplazar al centavo normal con mucha suerte.

items.name: Megatroll Bomb(Bomba Megatrol)
items.Descripcin: Al igual que las bombas troles normales, las bombas megatroles intentarn explotar tan rpido como puedas tras aparecer. Pero son ms difciles de esquivar debido que estas bombas intentarn acercarse al jugador (al menos de que l est demasiado lejos). Tambin intentarn explotar rpido si estn lo suficientemente cerca del jugador. Estas son afectadas por el trinketSafety Scissors.

items.name: Trinkets(Baratijas)
items.Descripcin: Las baratijas son objetos que pueden ser recogidos y se guardarn en un espacio exclusivo para ellas. Estas siempre otorgan un efecto pasivo. Se pueden llevar dos a la vez conBelly Buttono se puede absorber el efecto de esta y la propia baratija conSmelter, lapldora Gulp!oMarblespara ahorrar espacio.

items.name: Double Heart(Doble Corazn)
items.Descripcin: Al igual que las bombas dobles, los corazones dobles recuperan dos corazones (4 puntos de vida, dos contenedores de corazones enteros) en vez de uno solo. Poca veces aparecen. ConHumbling Bundle, estos remplazan a los corazones normales.

items.name: Black Heart(Corazn Negro)
items.Descripcin: Estos corazones son considerados por el juego como corazones de alma. La diferencia es que los corazones negros al desaparecer activan un efecto similar a deThe Necronomicon, haciendo dao masivo en toda la habitacin. Al ser considerados como corazones de alma, estos no afectan la posibilidad de obtener una sala de pacto.

items.name: Key Ring(Llavero)
items.Descripcin: Igual que las bombas dobles y los corazones dobles, los llaveros son la versin doble de su contraparte normal, dando dos llaves en vez de una sola. Capaz de remplazar a la llave normal. Remplazan a estas si se tieneHumbling Bundle.

items.name: Double Penny(Doble Centavo)
items.Descripcin: La variacin doble del centavo. Vale 2 monedas en vez de una sola. Remplaza al centavo normal en alguna ocasiones o siempre si se tieneHumbling Bundle.

items.name: Grab Bag(Bolsa de Mano)
items.Descripcin: Estas son bolsas que al ser tocadas revelarn ms recolectables. Puede haber objetos que hagan aparecerlas ms seguido o que mejoren sus recompensas comoSack Head.

items.name: Lil' Battery(Batera Pequea)
items.Descripcin: Las bateras otorgan energa para los coleccionables activables. Siempre llenan la barra, excepto si la barra necesita 12, solamente llenando 6 unidades.

items.name: Gold Heart(Corazn de Oro)
items.Descripcin: Los corazones de oro son corazones que no otorgan vida realmente. Estos se aaden al ltimo corazn (de izquierda a derecha) que se tenga, aadindole un contorno dorado. Vaciar el contenedor donde estaba el corazn de oro har aparecer muchas monedas.

items.name: Golden Bomb(Bomba Dorada)
items.Descripcin: Las bombas doradas funcionan igual que las llaves doradas, otorgan un nmero ilimitado de bombas hasta pasar al siguiente piso.

items.name: Lucky Penny(Centavo Suertudo)
items.Descripcin: Los centavos suertudos son centavos que se ven iguales a los centavos normales, pero no solamente aaden un centavo al contador, tambin aumentan la suerte al ser recogidos. Estos centavos no pueden ser convertidos en centavos dobles porHumbling Bundle, hacindolos ms fciles de diferenciar. Desde el Booster Pack #5 deAfterbirth+, los centavos son diferentes a los centavos normales; los suertudos teniendo un brillo ms verde en su animacin.
items.Mtodo de desbloqueo: Dona un centavo a lamquina de la codicia.

items.name: Sticky Nickel(Nquel Pegajoso)
items.Descripcin: Estos aparecen como los niqueles normales, pero si se intenta recolectar, no se podr ya que estn pegados al piso. La nica forma de conseguirlos es si estos reciben una explosin antes, as logrando despegarlos del suelo.

items.name: Half Soul Heart(Medio Corazn de Alma)
items.Descripcin: Los medios corazones de alma aaden medio corazn en vez de uno solo. Son pocos comunes a diferencia que su versin normal.

items.name: Scared Heart(Corazn Asustado)
items.Descripcin: Igual a los corazones normales en apariencia y cantidad que recupera, los corazones asustados son corazones ms difciles de conseguir debido a que intentarn escapar del jugador. Cuando se intenta tocar, se alejarn. Se pueden terminar recogiendo uno si se encierra en una esquina. Difcil de notarlo, pero en realidad los corazones asustados laten ms rpido que cualquier otro corazn.
items.Mtodo de desbloqueo: Reinicia 7 veces la partida usando Cntrl+R.

items.name: Blended Heart(Corazn Mezclado)
items.Descripcin: Los corazones mezclados harn un efecto diferente dependiendo de la salud del jugador. Estos curan un contenedor de corazones si falta o se aaden un corazn de alma si ya se tiene todos los contenedores llenos.

items.name: Bone Heart(Corazn de Hueso)
items.Descripcin: Los corazones huesos fueron aadidos en el Booster Pack #5 junto conThe Forgotten. Estos corazones pueden ser recogidos como los de alma, aadiendo estos corazones aparte de los contenedores. Estos pueden ser llenados por corazones rojos, pudiendo resistir al menos 3 puntos de vida y pueden ser destruidos al igual que los corazones de alma.

items.name: Charged Key(Llave Cargada)
items.Descripcin: Las llaves cargadas no solamente aaden una llave sino que tambin aaden energa a tu coleccionable activable como si fueran una batera.

items.name: Rotten Heart(Corazn Podrido)
items.Descripcin: Los corazones podridos rellenan un contenedor de corazn entero o el corazn rojo que este mas a la derecha si los contenedores del jugador estn repletos. Su valor en aguante es equivalente al de medio corazn. Cada corazn podrido en la barra de vida del jugador generara dos moscas al limpiar la sala.
items.Mtodo de desbloqueo: Entrar a Corpse por primera vez

items.name: Golden Penny(Penique Dorado)
items.Descripcin: Hace aparecer otro penique dorado en un lugar al azar en la misma sala al ser recogido, pero tiene una chance de 5% de desaparecer en su lugar.

items.name: Golden Troll Bomb(Bomba Troll Dorada)'
items.Descripcin: De forma similar a las bombas troll, aparece ya encendida y no puede ser recogida. De todas formas, esta explota infinitamente, de forma similar a las bombas doradas recolectable.Safety Scissorsvolvera esta en una bomba dorada recogible antes de explotar.

items.name: Giga Bomb(Bomba Gigante)
items.Descripcin: Las bombas gigantes explotan y destruyen el piso en forma de diamante. Hacen 300 de dao a enemigos. Son lanzadas por Bombgaggers, Ultra War y se generan ya encendidas en algunas habitaciones de Ashpit. Pueden ser obtenidas vaSafety ScissorsoEverything Jar.

items.name: Horse Pill(Pldora de Caballo)
items.Descripcin: Las pldoras de caballo son versiones gigantes de las pldoras normales con un efecto duplicado, pero aparecen muy raramente. Al usarlas se pueden escuchar efectos de sonido nicos, y las lineas de voz del narrador para las pldoras de caballo son exageradas comparadas con las de las pldoras normales.

items.name: Pill Gold-Gold(Pldora Dorada-Dorada)
items.Descripcin: Las pldoras doradas tienen una chance de desaparecer al consumirlas, lo que significa puede ser usada mltiples veces siempre y cuando esta no se desvanezca. Da un efecto de pldora al azar al uso.

items.name: Horse pill gold-gold(Pldora de caballo dorada-dorada)
items.Descripcin: Las pildoras doradas de caballo tienen un chance de desaparecer al consumirlas mientras que tambien tienen efectos duplicados.

items.name: Black Sack(Saco Negro)
items.Descripcin: Los sacos negros soltarn 2-3 pldoras, corazones negros o de hueso, y/o bombas al tomarlos.

items.name: Micro Battery(Micro Batera)
items.Descripcin: Las micro bateras recargan el objeto activo del jugador por 2 barras al tomarlas.

items.name: Mega Battery(Mega Batera)
items.Descripcin: Las mega bateras recargan el objeto activo del jugador por 2 activaciones al tomarlas.

items.name: Golden Battery(Batera Dorada)
items.Descripcin: Las bateras doradas recargan completamente el objeto activo del jugador, pero tambin daan 1 corazn entero. Otra batera dorada aparecer en una habitacin al azar, pero no se mostrara en el mapa hasta que la descubras.
